Title: Lava Lava Beach Club
Content: Dig your toes in the sand while enjoying breakfast, lunch or dinner on the beach at Kauai Shores Hotel. Enjoy fresh fish entrees, pizza, fish tacos and tropical libations while entertained by live music. The restaurant and bar offers several hundred seats in an open air setting complete with swaying palm trees, tropical trade winds and a relaxed, island vibe.

Title: Luau Kalamaku
Content: Luau at Kalamaku offers three activity packages to suit all preferences at Kilohana Plantation. Watch only the Polynesian show; or do the show, island cuisine and arts and crafts; or opt for the deluxe "Plantation Owners Evening" with a specialized dinner at the on-site Gaylord's Restaurant, arts and crafts demos and Polynesian show.

Title: Makana Charters
Content: Take a morning or afternoon cruise along the Na Pali Coast on your choice of a 49- or 32-foot custom catamaran with Makana Charters, a Hawaiian-owned company. Explore sea caves, snorkel and enjoy a deli-style lunch. Trips depart from Kekaha Harbor on the west side for quicker access to the Na Pali.

Title: Mariachi's
Content: Enjoy a south-of-the border ambiance for breakfast, lunch and dinner at Mariachi's. Mexican favorites includes Burrito Surf and Turt, Carne Asada Fries, Ceviche Acapulco, Molcajete and Mole de Oaxaca. Second location in Lihue,

Title: Merriman's Fish House
Content: The founder of Hawaii Regional Cuisine, Peter Merriman, offers food focusing on local ingredients that's prepared to highlight Hawaii's ethnic flavors. Signature dinner entrees include Original Wok Charred Ahi, Mac Nut Crusted Mahi Mahi and sauteed Kauai shrimp. Serving french press Kauai coffees and island-inspired desserts like Coconut Creme Brulee and Lilikoi Mousse.

Title: Monico's Taqueria
Content: An Oaxaca native, Monico Martinez is the chef at this eastside taqueria that gets rave reviews by hungry visitors. Open for lunch and dinner, Monico's emphasizes seafood and offers generous potions of all the Mexican favorites. Located in Kinipopo Shopping Village.

Title: Na Pali Riders
Content: Zip along the jaw-dropping Nāpali Coast in fast and maneuverable Zodiac© rigid hull, inflatable rafts with Nā Pali Riders, who have been in business for 22 years. Departing from Kīkīa‘ola Small Boat Harbor in Waimea, the closest harbor to the Nāpali Coast, Nā Pali Riders makes your experience worth every penny as they explore the entire 17-mile coastline with its white sand beaches, towering sea cliffs, lush valleys, waterfalls and sea caves (weather permitting). Along the way, you’ll likely see dolphins, seabirds and perhaps the endangered Hawaiian green sea turtle or Hawaiian monk seal. Snacks and drinks are included, as well as snorkeling (weather permitting). Whale watch in season and ask about their private charters too!
lp_listingpro_options: a:32:{s:12:"tagline_text";s:33:"Na Pali Coast raft tours on Kauai";s:8:"gAddress";s:40:"9600 Kaumaulii Highway, Waimea, HI 96796";s:8:"latitude";s:18:"21.956929697519293";s:9:"longitude";s:19:"-159.67303261139094";s:6:"mappin";s:0:"";s:5:"phone";s:12:"808-742-6331";s:8:"whatsapp";s:0:"";s:5:"email";s:21:"info@napaliriders.com";s:7:"website";s:27:"http://www.napaliriders.com";s:7:"twitter";s:0:"";s:8:"facebook";s:37:"https://www.facebook.com/napaliriders";s:8:"linkedin";s:0:"";s:7:"youtube";s:0:"";s:9:"instagram";s:39:"https://www.instagram.com/napaliriders/";s:5:"video";s:0:"";s:7:"gallery";s:0:"";s:12:"price_status";s:6:"notsay";s:10:"list_price";s:0:"";s:13:"list_price_to";s:0:"";s:7:"Plan_id";s:1:"0";s:16:"lp_purchase_days";s:0:"";s:11:"reviews_ids";s:0:"";s:15:"claimed_section";s:11:"not_claimed";s:26:"listings_ads_purchase_date";s:0:"";s:30:"listings_ads_purchase_packages";s:0:"";s:4:"faqs";a:2:{s:3:"faq";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}s:6:"faqans";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}}s:14:"business_hours";s:0:"";s:11:"campaign_id";s:4:"9767";s:14:"changed_planid";s:0:"";s:19:"listing_reported_by";s:0:"";s:16:"listing_reported";s:0:"";s:13:"business_logo";s:0:"";}

Title: Na Pali Tours
Content: Conveniently departing either from Hanalei Bay on the east side or Kekaha on the west side, Na Pali Tours offers four-hour snorkel adventures and sunset tours along the isle's magnificient, famed coastline. Ocean condiitons permitting, motor inside several sea caves and alongside cascading waterfalls aboard the UFOII, a 32-foot catamaran.

Title: Princeville Ranch Adventures
Content: Adventures await on the northside of Kauai at Princeville Ranch. Fun includes zipling, horseback riding, hiking to a waterfall for a swim, an off-road adventure and kayaking. Princeville Ranch is a working cattle ranch, raising 100% grass-fed beef.
Image Description: Zip 1200 feet across a private ranch on ÒKing Kong!Ó

Title: RumFire at Poipu Beach
Content: RumFire serves an innovative menu blending locally sourced ingredients with global influences. Menu offerings include seared ahi, kauai shrimp and clams, butterfish, Hawaiian jerk chicken, filet mignon and braised short ribs. A four-course prix fixe menu is also available. Selection of after-dinner libations.
lp_listingpro_options: a:32:{s:12:"tagline_text";s:32:"Oceanside dining in Poipu, Kauai";s:8:"gAddress";s:34:"2440 Hoonani Road, Poipu, HI 96756";s:8:"latitude";s:18:"21.875773628578624";s:9:"longitude";s:19:"-159.46197853350782";s:6:"mappin";s:0:"";s:5:"phone";s:12:"808-742-4786";s:8:"whatsapp";s:0:"";s:5:"email";s:0:"";s:7:"website";s:29:"https://www.rumfirekauai.com/";s:7:"twitter";s:0:"";s:8:"facebook";s:0:"";s:8:"linkedin";s:0:"";s:7:"youtube";s:0:"";s:9:"instagram";s:0:"";s:5:"video";s:0:"";s:7:"gallery";s:0:"";s:12:"price_status";s:6:"pricey";s:10:"list_price";s:0:"";s:13:"list_price_to";s:0:"";s:7:"Plan_id";s:1:"0";s:16:"lp_purchase_days";s:0:"";s:11:"reviews_ids";s:0:"";s:15:"claimed_section";s:11:"not_claimed";s:26:"listings_ads_purchase_date";s:0:"";s:30:"listings_ads_purchase_packages";s:0:"";s:4:"faqs";a:2:{s:3:"faq";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}s:6:"faqans";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}}s:14:"business_hours";s:0:"";s:11:"campaign_id";s:0:"";s:14:"changed_planid";s:0:"";s:19:"listing_reported_by";s:0:"";s:16:"listing_reported";s:0:"";s:13:"business_logo";s:0:"";}

Title: Seasport Divers
Content: Catering to divers of different abilities, Seasport offers two South Shore diving trips per day: the morning for experience divers and the afternoon for non-certified divers. Seasonal dives to Niihau and Lehua Rock are also available, plus classes and rental gear. With a second location in Kapaa, 808-823-9222, Seasport is locally owned and operated since 1987.

Title: Tapas @ Kukuiula
Content: Open for dinner nightly and late night happy hour and entertainment Fri.-Sat., Tapas sources local ingredients to prepare dishes like Okinawan Sweet Potato & Kabocha Pumpkin Tortellini, Kiawe Roasted Kobe Meatballs, 36-Hour Char Siu Pork Belly and Tempura Ahi Roll. At the helm is award-winning Chef Jean-Marie Josselin. French press teas and coffee can be had with desserts like Lilikoi Creme Brulee and island-flavored sorbettos.

Title: The Beach House Restaurant
Content: The philosophy at Beach House is simple: good, old-fashioned Hawaiian hospitality is blended with Pacific Rim cuisine and accompanied by an outstanding view to deliver an experience that delights all the senses. Serving lunch, afternoon light fare and dinner daily. Signature items is the house ceviche, seafood linguine, a variety of fresh catches and FIre Grilled Center Cut Pork Loin.

Title: Wings Over Kauai
Content: Choose from the 65-minute Grand Deluxe Tour or the 5.5-hour Air and Sea Combo Tour, which combines flightseeing with a snorkel/scuba adventure on the Na Pali Coast. Also available are intimate tours for two aboard a Cessna.

Title: The Eating House 1849
Content: Award-winning chef Roy Yamaguchi focuses on food that celebrates Hawaii's plantation era with the modernity of haute cuisine at this restaurant at The Shops at Kukuiula. Open nightly for dinner, offerings include Tavern Style Fried Chicken, Plantation Paella, a pork and beef burger, blackened ahi, beef short ribs and Mama's Pork & Tofu Lumpia.

Title: Tahiti Nui Restaurant
Content: This long-time establishment in the heart of Hanalei has a tropical vibe and was featured in the movie "The Descendants." Known for Mai Tais, Mac Nut Panko Crusted Ono and the kalua pork sandwich, it's a favorite with repeat visitors.
lp_listingpro_options: a:32:{s:12:"tagline_text";s:36:"Restaurant and bar in Hanalai, Kauai";s:8:"gAddress";s:36:"5-5134 Kuhio Hwy., Hanalei, HI 96714";s:8:"latitude";s:10:"22.2034294";s:9:"longitude";s:12:"-159.4951667";s:6:"mappin";s:0:"";s:5:"phone";s:12:"808-826-6277";s:8:"whatsapp";s:0:"";s:5:"email";s:0:"";s:7:"website";s:21:"http://www.thenui.com";s:7:"twitter";s:0:"";s:8:"facebook";s:0:"";s:8:"linkedin";s:0:"";s:7:"youtube";s:0:"";s:9:"instagram";s:0:"";s:5:"video";s:0:"";s:7:"gallery";s:0:"";s:12:"price_status";s:6:"notsay";s:10:"list_price";s:0:"";s:13:"list_price_to";s:0:"";s:7:"Plan_id";s:1:"0";s:16:"lp_purchase_days";s:0:"";s:11:"reviews_ids";s:0:"";s:15:"claimed_section";s:11:"not_claimed";s:26:"listings_ads_purchase_date";s:0:"";s:30:"listings_ads_purchase_packages";s:0:"";s:4:"faqs";a:2:{s:3:"faq";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}s:6:"faqans";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}}s:14:"business_hours";s:0:"";s:11:"campaign_id";s:0:"";s:14:"changed_planid";s:0:"";s:19:"listing_reported_by";s:0:"";s:16:"listing_reported";s:0:"";s:13:"business_logo";s:0:"";}

Title: Nana's Snack Shack
Content: Sought after for pitaya and acai bowls, Nana's also serves taro burgers, Asian chicken wraps, grilled cheese, paninis and other sandwiches.

Title: Makai Sushi
Content: Located inside Kukuiula Market and known for its fresh fish bowls topped with veggies and sauces. Variety of sushi rolls made while you wait for lunch and dinner. Limited seating, take out too
lp_listingpro_options: a:32:{s:12:"tagline_text";s:48:"Fresh fish bowls and sushi rolls in Koloa, Kauai";s:8:"gAddress";s:32:"2827 Poipu Road, Koloa, HI 96756";s:8:"latitude";s:10:"21.8848685";s:9:"longitude";s:11:"-159.468105";s:6:"mappin";s:0:"";s:5:"phone";s:12:"808-639-7219";s:8:"whatsapp";s:0:"";s:5:"email";s:0:"";s:7:"website";s:22:"http://makaisushi.com/";s:7:"twitter";s:0:"";s:8:"facebook";s:0:"";s:8:"linkedin";s:0:"";s:7:"youtube";s:0:"";s:9:"instagram";s:0:"";s:5:"video";s:0:"";s:7:"gallery";s:0:"";s:12:"price_status";s:6:"notsay";s:10:"list_price";s:0:"";s:13:"list_price_to";s:0:"";s:7:"Plan_id";s:2:"53";s:16:"lp_purchase_days";s:0:"";s:11:"reviews_ids";s:0:"";s:15:"claimed_section";s:11:"not_claimed";s:26:"listings_ads_purchase_date";s:0:"";s:30:"listings_ads_purchase_packages";s:0:"";s:4:"faqs";a:2:{s:3:"faq";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}s:6:"faqans";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}}s:14:"business_hours";s:0:"";s:11:"campaign_id";s:0:"";s:14:"changed_planid";s:0:"";s:19:"listing_reported_by";s:0:"";s:16:"listing_reported";s:0:"";s:13:"business_logo";s:0:"";}

Title: Pono Market
Content: Mom and Pop convenience store offering food for the working crowd. Find everything from Hawaiian plate lunches to fried chicken to spam musubi. A favorite spot for manjua treat with a chewy pie crust filled with apples, coconut and taro/ube. Take out and outdoor seating.

Title: Sushi Girl Kauai
Content: Sushi and poke bowls at this grab-and-go eatery. The 12-piece Legend and Sushi Burrito are popular items. Wainiha is located between Hanalei and Haena on Kauai's North Shore.

Title: Aloha Aina Juice Cafe
Content: One-stop shop for fruit and vegetable juices, smoothies and acai bowls, plus wellness shots. Aloha Aina sources local ingredients, including granola, plus a variety of add-ons like peanut butter and chocolate chips for the acai bowls. Favorite is the Chunky Monkey.
lp_listingpro_options: a:32:{s:12:"tagline_text";s:46:"Juice, smoothies and acai bowls in Puhi, Kauai";s:8:"gAddress";s:31:"4495 Puhi Road, Lihue, HI 96766";s:8:"latitude";s:10:"21.9691567";s:9:"longitude";s:12:"-159.3873139";s:6:"mappin";s:0:"";s:5:"phone";s:12:"808-378-4256";s:8:"whatsapp";s:0:"";s:5:"email";s:0:"";s:7:"website";s:30:"https://www.alohaainajuice.com";s:7:"twitter";s:0:"";s:8:"facebook";s:0:"";s:8:"linkedin";s:0:"";s:7:"youtube";s:0:"";s:9:"instagram";s:0:"";s:5:"video";s:0:"";s:7:"gallery";s:0:"";s:12:"price_status";s:6:"notsay";s:10:"list_price";s:0:"";s:13:"list_price_to";s:0:"";s:7:"Plan_id";s:2:"53";s:16:"lp_purchase_days";s:0:"";s:11:"reviews_ids";s:0:"";s:15:"claimed_section";s:11:"not_claimed";s:26:"listings_ads_purchase_date";s:0:"";s:30:"listings_ads_purchase_packages";s:0:"";s:4:"faqs";a:2:{s:3:"faq";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}s:6:"faqans";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}}s:14:"business_hours";a:6:{s:8:"Saturday";a:2:{s:4:"open";s:7:"08:00am";s:5:"close";s:7:"03:00pm";}s:6:"Monday";a:2:{s:4:"open";s:7:"08:00am";s:5:"close";s:7:"03:00pm";}s:7:"Tuesday";a:2:{s:4:"open";s:7:"08:00am";s:5:"close";s:7:"03:00pm";}s:9:"Wednesday";a:2:{s:4:"open";s:7:"08:00am";s:5:"close";s:7:"03:00pm";}s:8:"Thursday";a:2:{s:4:"open";s:7:"08:00am";s:5:"close";s:7:"03:00pm";}s:6:"Friday";a:2:{s:4:"open";s:7:"08:00am";s:5:"close";s:7:"03:00pm";}}s:11:"campaign_id";s:0:"";s:14:"changed_planid";s:0:"";s:19:"listing_reported_by";s:0:"";s:16:"listing_reported";s:0:"";s:13:"business_logo";s:0:"";}

Title: Wailua Shave Ice Cafe
Content: Specialty shave ice treats like the Lava Flow with pineapple juice, coconut foam, strawberry puree and fruit topping or the Uala Niu with coconut milk, purple sweet potato and roasted coconut flakes.

Title: Tiki Tacos
Content: The focus here is tacos, made with handmade tortillas, variety of meats or vegetarian with regular or spicy sauce. Fish and kalua pig tacos a favorite. Serving lunch and dinner daily with limited seating. Takeout.

Title: Aunty Lilikoi
Content:
Aunty Lilikoi Products recently earned a gold medal for its Passion Fruit Wasabi Dressing at the 22nd Annual World Wide Mustard Competition held at the National Mustard Museum in Middleton, Wisconsin. The dressing also won both category first place finish and division champion awards at the World Hot Sauce Awards held in April in Lafayette, Louisiana.

Find award-winning mustards, syrups, jams and more all made on Kauai.
lp_listingpro_options: a:32:{s:12:"tagline_text";s:31:"Passion fruit products in Kauai";s:8:"gAddress";s:34:"9875 Waimea Road, Waimea, HI 96796";s:8:"latitude";s:9:"21.955186";s:9:"longitude";s:11:"-159.667204";s:6:"mappin";s:0:"";s:5:"phone";s:12:"808-338-1296";s:8:"whatsapp";s:0:"";s:5:"email";s:21:"info@auntylilikoi.com";s:7:"website";s:27:"http://www.auntylilikoi.com";s:7:"twitter";s:0:"";s:8:"facebook";s:0:"";s:8:"linkedin";s:0:"";s:7:"youtube";s:0:"";s:9:"instagram";s:0:"";s:5:"video";s:0:"";s:7:"gallery";s:0:"";s:12:"price_status";s:6:"notsay";s:10:"list_price";s:0:"";s:13:"list_price_to";s:0:"";s:7:"Plan_id";s:2:"53";s:16:"lp_purchase_days";s:0:"";s:11:"reviews_ids";s:0:"";s:15:"claimed_section";s:11:"not_claimed";s:26:"listings_ads_purchase_date";s:0:"";s:30:"listings_ads_purchase_packages";s:0:"";s:4:"faqs";a:2:{s:3:"faq";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}s:6:"faqans";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}}s:14:"business_hours";s:0:"";s:11:"campaign_id";s:4:"9793";s:14:"changed_planid";s:0:"";s:19:"listing_reported_by";s:0:"";s:16:"listing_reported";s:0:"";s:13:"business_logo";s:0:"";}

Title: The Dolphin Restaurant
Content: Eat and shop at The Dolphin's restaurant, fish market and sushi lounge with locations in Hanalei and Poipu. Both offer shoppers a large selection of local and fresh-cut fish, choice steaks, specialty cheeses and local greens. In Hanalei, enjoy a peaceful outdoor lunch alongside the Hanalei River. In Poipu, spoil yourself with gourmet sushi, a specialty cocktail, fish and steak entrees and a sunset view from the lanai. Locations also in Hanalei and Poipu.

Title: The Wine Garden
Content: Shop for a large selection of fine wines, specialty beers, hand-rolled Kauai cigars, wine accessories and custom gift basket across from Kauai Community College.

Title: Papaya's Natural Foods and Cafe
Content: Shop for local and organic produce, household items, supplements, gluten-free, body care, plus specialty and bulk foods. Cafe offers house-made taro burger, fish tacos, grilled tofu and a hot and cold salad bar.

Title: Midnight Bear Breads
Content: Find rustic breads, pastries, croissants, pizza, tartine, nut butters, spreads and coffee at this retail bakery. Midnight Bear specializes in European style breads, offering sweet and savory options and also gluten-free.
lp_listingpro_options: a:32:{s:12:"tagline_text";s:25:"Bakery in Hanapepe, Kauai";s:8:"gAddress";s:38:"3830 Hanapepe Road, Hanapepe, HI 96716";s:8:"latitude";s:10:"21.9112073";s:9:"longitude";s:12:"-159.5873521";s:6:"mappin";s:0:"";s:5:"phone";s:12:"808-346-4949";s:8:"whatsapp";s:0:"";s:5:"email";s:0:"";s:7:"website";s:39:"http://www.midnightbearbreads.com/menu/";s:7:"twitter";s:0:"";s:8:"facebook";s:0:"";s:8:"linkedin";s:0:"";s:7:"youtube";s:0:"";s:9:"instagram";s:0:"";s:5:"video";s:0:"";s:7:"gallery";s:0:"";s:12:"price_status";s:6:"notsay";s:10:"list_price";s:0:"";s:13:"list_price_to";s:0:"";s:7:"Plan_id";s:2:"53";s:16:"lp_purchase_days";s:0:"";s:11:"reviews_ids";s:0:"";s:15:"claimed_section";s:11:"not_claimed";s:26:"listings_ads_purchase_date";s:0:"";s:30:"listings_ads_purchase_packages";s:0:"";s:4:"faqs";a:2:{s:3:"faq";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}s:6:"faqans";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}}s:14:"business_hours";s:0:"";s:11:"campaign_id";s:0:"";s:14:"changed_planid";s:0:"";s:19:"listing_reported_by";s:0:"";s:16:"listing_reported";s:0:"";s:13:"business_logo";s:0:"";}

Title: Harvest Market Hanalei
Content: Find groceries, health and beauty, gift and specialty items at the Harvest Market Hanalei. Known for daily soups, hot entrees, fully stocked fresh salad bar, fruit smoothies, sandwiches and wraps, daily baked pastries and organic coffee and teas. Gluten-free items too.

Title: Bar Acuda
Content: Serving small-dish tapas, cocktails, beer and over 50 wines. Offerings include salads like Medjool dates, Manchego cheese and arugula, risotto fritters with mozzarella center, seared sea scallops, roasted Hawaiian ahi and slow-braised pork belly with roasted apple.

Title: La Spezia Restaurant and Wine Bar
Content: Savor house-made tortellini and fried mushroom risotto balls for appetizers while entrees include lasagna, eggplant parmesan, house-made ravioli with smoked salmon, hangar steak and pan seared veal scallopini. Menu changes seasonally. Located in Old Koloa Town next to the Koloa Big Save.

Title: Hanalei Bread Company
Content: Organic bakery and coffee house serves breakfast and lunch before 2 p.m.in the Hanalei Town Center. Breakfast burritos, variety of baked goods, roasts of local coffees and milk. Gluten-free too.

Title: Anahola Granola
Content: Made since 1986 using nuts, seeds, unsulphered tropical fruits, canola oil, Hawaiian honey and vanilla beans. Purchase granola and bars online or at numerous statewide retailers including ABC Stores, grocers and natural food stores on Kauai. Also served at hotels and restaurants.
lp_listingpro_options: a:32:{s:12:"tagline_text";s:35:"Handmade granola in Hanapepe, Kauai";s:8:"gAddress";s:36:"3567 Hanapepe Rd, Hanapepe, HI 96716";s:8:"latitude";s:10:"21.9102717";s:9:"longitude";s:12:"-159.5926913";s:6:"mappin";s:0:"";s:5:"phone";s:12:"800-650-6016";s:8:"whatsapp";s:0:"";s:5:"email";s:23:"info@anaholagranola.com";s:7:"website";s:0:"";s:7:"twitter";s:0:"";s:8:"facebook";s:0:"";s:8:"linkedin";s:0:"";s:7:"youtube";s:0:"";s:9:"instagram";s:0:"";s:5:"video";s:0:"";s:7:"gallery";s:0:"";s:12:"price_status";s:6:"notsay";s:10:"list_price";s:0:"";s:13:"list_price_to";s:0:"";s:7:"Plan_id";s:2:"53";s:16:"lp_purchase_days";s:0:"";s:11:"reviews_ids";s:0:"";s:15:"claimed_section";s:11:"not_claimed";s:26:"listings_ads_purchase_date";s:0:"";s:30:"listings_ads_purchase_packages";s:0:"";s:4:"faqs";a:2:{s:3:"faq";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}s:6:"faqans";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}}s:14:"business_hours";s:0:"";s:11:"campaign_id";s:0:"";s:14:"changed_planid";s:0:"";s:19:"listing_reported_by";s:0:"";s:16:"listing_reported";s:0:"";s:13:"business_logo";s:0:"";}

Title: Kauai Pasta Lihue
Content: For lunch, savor offerings like panini sandwiches and Garlic Herb Grilled Portabella Mushroom Salad. Dinner entrees include White Wine Steamed Clams, pastas, Four Cheese & Spinach Manicotti, Pesto Grilled Chicken, veal marsala and homemade gnocchi. Sides like roasted cauliflower and sauteed swiss chard & spinach. Beer, wine, cocktails and keiki menu.
Image Title: Italian cuisine is served at KP Lihue located on Kuhio Highway.
Image Description: Italian cuisine is served at KP Lihue located on Kuhio Highway.

Title: Da Crack
Content: Casual Mexican menu offering tacos, burritos, nachos and sides. Open for lunch and dinner with generous portions. A favorite is the chipotle sour cream.

Title: Tidepools
Content: Located in the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort & Spa, Tidepools serves contemporary Hawaiian cuisine in thatched-roof bungalows "floating" above a koi-filled lagoon at the base of a waterfall. The award-winning restaurant Serves dinner with appetizers like Taro Root Croquettes and a wide selection of fresh fish entrees, plus steaks, prime rib and Griller Wild Boar Rack of Ribs. A showstopper is the Molten Chocolate Cake for dessert.
lp_listingpro_options: a:32:{s:12:"tagline_text";s:20:"Fine dining in Poipu";s:8:"gAddress";s:30:"1571 Poipu Rd, Poipu, HI 96756";s:8:"latitude";s:10:"21.8754387";s:9:"longitude";s:12:"-159.4389759";s:6:"mappin";s:0:"";s:5:"phone";s:12:"808-240-6380";s:8:"whatsapp";s:0:"";s:5:"email";s:0:"";s:7:"website";s:31:"https://www.tidepoolskauai.com/";s:7:"twitter";s:0:"";s:8:"facebook";s:0:"";s:8:"linkedin";s:0:"";s:7:"youtube";s:0:"";s:9:"instagram";s:0:"";s:5:"video";s:0:"";s:7:"gallery";s:0:"";s:12:"price_status";s:14:"ultra_high_end";s:10:"list_price";s:0:"";s:13:"list_price_to";s:0:"";s:7:"Plan_id";s:1:"0";s:16:"lp_purchase_days";s:0:"";s:11:"reviews_ids";s:0:"";s:15:"claimed_section";s:11:"not_claimed";s:26:"listings_ads_purchase_date";s:0:"";s:30:"listings_ads_purchase_packages";s:0:"";s:4:"faqs";a:2:{s:3:"faq";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}s:6:"faqans";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}}s:14:"business_hours";s:0:"";s:11:"campaign_id";s:0:"";s:14:"changed_planid";s:0:"";s:19:"listing_reported_by";s:0:"";s:16:"listing_reported";s:0:"";s:13:"business_logo";s:0:"";}

Title: Verde Restaurant
Content: Serving lunch and dinner daily at Kapaa Shopping Center and using grass-fed Kauai beef, antibiotic- and hormone-free chicken and pork and local produce. The stacked enchilada is the signature menu item and other standouts include the red chile hominy soup and the huevos rancheros. Many options for burritos and tacos. Margarita bar.

Title: Plantation Gardens Restaurant
Content: Surrounded by glowing tiki torches and the beautiful Moir Gardens at Kiahuna Plantation resort, Plantation Gardens features Pacific Rim cuisine with regional Hawaiian influences. Dine inside or out for dinner. The unusual cactus/succulent garden is worth a visit by itself.

Title: Duke's Canoe Club
Content: Located on the sand at the Kauai Marriott Resort, the casual Barefoot Bar opens at 11 a.m. for pupus salads, sandwiches and cocktails. For Duke's at dinner, a salad bar accompanies all entrees like Mango BBQ Ribs, Mac Nut Crusted Fish or slow roasted prime rib. Valet in Dukes lot off Rice Street; valet or self-parking at the Kauai Marriott Resort.
lp_listingpro_options: a:32:{s:12:"tagline_text";s:52:"Oceanfront dining and barefoot bar at Kalapaki Beach";s:8:"gAddress";s:30:"3610 Rice St., Lihue, HI 96766";s:8:"latitude";s:10:"21.9606228";s:9:"longitude";s:19:"-159.35157669999998";s:6:"mappin";s:0:"";s:5:"phone";s:12:"808-246-9599";s:8:"whatsapp";s:0:"";s:5:"email";s:0:"";s:7:"website";s:28:"https://www.dukeswaikiki.com";s:7:"twitter";s:0:"";s:8:"facebook";s:0:"";s:8:"linkedin";s:0:"";s:7:"youtube";s:0:"";s:9:"instagram";s:0:"";s:5:"video";s:0:"";s:7:"gallery";s:0:"";s:12:"price_status";s:6:"notsay";s:10:"list_price";s:0:"";s:13:"list_price_to";s:0:"";s:7:"Plan_id";s:2:"53";s:16:"lp_purchase_days";s:0:"";s:11:"reviews_ids";s:0:"";s:15:"claimed_section";s:11:"not_claimed";s:26:"listings_ads_purchase_date";s:0:"";s:30:"listings_ads_purchase_packages";s:0:"";s:4:"faqs";a:2:{s:3:"faq";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}s:6:"faqans";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}}s:14:"business_hours";s:0:"";s:11:"campaign_id";s:0:"";s:14:"changed_planid";s:0:"";s:19:"listing_reported_by";s:0:"";s:16:"listing_reported";s:0:"";s:13:"business_logo";s:0:"";}

Title: Pizzetta Italian Kitchen & Bar
Content: Relying on recipes from the chef's home town of Altomonte, Italy, Pizzetta offers specialty pizzas, appetizers and salads. Entrees include Chicken Milanese, Eggplant Parmigiana, lasagne and Spaghetti Pomodoro. Eat at tables or at the bar. Poipu delivery.

Title: Ishihara Market
Content: Poke-chopped and seasoned raw fish is the food specialty here with numerous kinds like spicy ahi, kimchi tako, plus ocean salad, spam musubi, sandwiches and plate lunches. Also find local items like poi, kulolo and pipikaula. A favorite spot for locals heading to the beach or work. Outside benches for eating.

Title: Ono Family Restaurant
Content: This homey cafe serves breakfast, burgers and local-style specialties, plus shaved ice and smoothies. Open for breakfast and lunch. Favorites are the Ahi Benedict, mahimahi burge and loco mocos. Lots of flavors for shave ice too.

Title: Kalapaki Beach Hut
Content: Breakfast offerings includes Portuguese Sweet Bread French Toast, loco mocos and fruit smoothies. A simple lunch menu, served all day, ranges from beef and taro burgers to fish and chips, fish sandwiches and taro fries. Get refreshed with a shave ice or try a Kalapaki Coconut: fresh and sweet coconut water straight from the shell. Perfect photo opp!

Title: The Bistro
Content: Open for lunch and dinner with a full bar in the Kong Lung Village Center on the way to Kilauea Lighthouse. Dinner entrees include Ginger-Crusted Fresh Catch, Coconut-Crusted Park, Saint Louis Ribs, Burgundy Rib Eye and Artichoke Picatta. Pick your pasta and sauce.

Title: Puka Dog
Content: Pick your Polish sausage or veggie dog and then decide on choice of sauce, Hawaiian fruit relish and mustard. Dogs are nestled in warm Hawaiian sweet bread buns. Fresh squeezed lemonade while you watch. Shave ice too-15 flavors. Second location at Ching Young Village in Hanalei.

Title: Shrimp Station
Content: Find a wide variety of shrimp dishes, inluding Coconut Shrimpthe specialty Garlic Shrimp, Cajun Shrimp, Thai Shrimp, Shrimp Tacos, Shrimp Burgers and more.

Title: Lappert's Hawaii
Content: What started as a tiny Kauai ice cream shop in 1983 has grown to a favorite statewide specialty chain serving premium ice cream, sorbet, gelato, cookies and coffee. Signature flavors include Kona Coffee, Kauai Pie, Heavenly Hana, Coconut Macadamia Nut Fudge, Hayden Mango, Kilauea Guava and Auntie Lilikoi's Passion Fruit. Numerous locations throughout the islands

Title: Brick Oven Pizza
Content: Brick Oven Pizza has been in business for over 30 years offering hearth-baked pizza with numerous toppings. Also on the menu are soups, salads, sandwiches and appetizers like fresh oysters, pupu pizza, calamari and brushetta. Sister location in Wailua Golf Course. Also open on Oahu.

Title: Living Foods Gourmet Market and Cafe
Content:
Located in the The Shops at Kukuiula, Living Foods offers fresh and locally made products' wine, beer and spirits; grab and go prepared foods, a bakery, a caf and juice bar. The cafe serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. 

Located in The Shops at Kukui'ula.
Image Alt Text: Living Foods Gourmet Market and Cafe - Kauai

Title: Anuenue Cafe
Content: Specializing in breakfast, Anuenue serves all the favorites with an island twist: fritatta-style omelets, Haupia Mac Nut French Toast, acai bowl and specialty sandwiches and plates for a picnic.

Title: Ilima Terrace
Content: Cascading waterfalls and koi-filled ponds surround you at Ilima Terrace. Serving breakfast and lunch daily, there's also an expansive buffet. Salads, sandwiches and specialty entrees are on tap for lunch. Keiki menu. Located in the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort & Spa.

Title: Dondero's
Content: Enjoy an evening of elegant ambiance, Old World favorites and exceptional service at Dondero's. Beautiful frescoed walls reminiscent of a vintage Tuscan villa set the tone. Menu offerings include sauteed Mediterranean mussels, pesto gnocchi, chef's daily risotto, baked sausage minestrone, neapolitan style pizza, veal marsala, grilled cioppino and Chicken Scaloppini picatta.

Title: Koloa Mill Ice Cream and Coffee
Content: Grab your sweet tooth! In addition to serving Maui's Roselani Ice Cream, Koloa Mill offers Kauai Coffee, locally made bakery items, Hawaii-made snacks, shave ice and fresh cotton candy. Open 7 a.m.-9 p.m. daily.

Title: Stevenson's Library
Content: This long-time luxury nightspot offers a truly unique and welcoming atmosphere with a 27-ft koa wood bar, outdoor lanai and intimate lounge seating at the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort & Spa. Stevenson's is the place for sushi, spirits and sounds. The bar boasts an extensive selection of whiskies, cognac, port, sake and and wine with live entertainment 8-11 p.m. nightly. Enjoy a selection of sushi and sashimi.

Title: Olympic Cafe
Content: Open for breakfast, lunch and dinner, the cafe serves over 200 menu items including burgers, salads, wraps, pastas and fresh local fish. Contemporary breakfast menu offers pancakes, omelettes and scrambles. Located in sunny Poipu.

Title: Pink's Creamery
Content: Pink's serves gourmet grilled cheese sandwiches, a selection of ice cream and frozen yogurt, plus smoothies and juices in a quaint little store off Hanalei's main drag. Diary-free-sorbet too.

Title: Hula Moon Gifts
Content: Browse for locally handmade Hawaii products and a potpourri of gift and jewelry items in Old Koloa Town.

Title: The Koa Store
Content: The Koa Store features the products of William and Zimmer Woodworkersfind all kinds of souvenirs and gifts made of Hawaii's prized wood. Original store is located at the turn off to Wailua Falls on the main highway in Kapaia, just down the hill from Wilcox Hospital.Sister location in Old Koloa Town.

Title: Progressive Expressions
Content: Progressive Expressions serves as the South Shore's surf outfitter, stocking surfboard and boogie board rentals. Shop for surf apparel and accessories, plus slippers, watches, backpacks and wallets.

Title: Fathom Five Ocean Quest Divers
Content: Five Fathoms features diving and snorkeling charters, dive equipment and related gear. Certified boat and shore dives, plus scuba classes are available.

Title: Southshore Bikinis
Content: Southshore specializes in Brazilian bikinis and beachwear for ages. Also find sundresses, hats, slippers and warm-weather accessories to do the beach in style including handpainted pareaus.

Title: Island Style Pacific Inspired Treasures & Adventures
Content: Located in a kiosk in the courtyard of Old Koloa Town, Island Style offers a slew of locally made product like the Original Aloha pillow, painted clocks depicting pineapples and turtles, jewelry, unique pussy cat pearls and kukui nut earrings. Island Style also books Kauai activities: zip lining, kayaking, snorkeling, flightseeing, luaus, fishing and more.

Title: Chicken in a Barrel
Content: Barrel-smoked meats are served for lunch and dinner daily: chicken, babyback ribs, beef and porkwith rice and homemade chili beans. Also burgers, hoagies, salads, corn bread and keiki menu. Sister location at Ching Young Village in Hanalei.

Title: Hanalei Gourmet
Content: Offering a cafe, tropical bar with live music and sports TV, and a gourmet deli, Hanalei Gourmet caters to visitors. Pack sandwiches, pastries and wine into insulated backacks or coolers for a beach picnic or hike. Happy Hour and live music in the bar starting 6 p.m. The Gourmet serves low sodium meats, fresh baked whole grain breads and homemade dressings for a Pacific Rim dining experience.

Title: Kalypso Island Bar and Grill
Content: American and island favorites are served for lunch and dinner, plus breakfast on the weekends. Choose from fresh catch of the day, New York steak, rotisserie chicken with mango teriyaki, coconut shrimp and mushroom ravioli. Large selection of tropical drinks and happy hour.
Image Alt Text: Kalypso Island Bar and Grill - Kauai

Title: Bubba's
Content: Making burgers since 1936, Bubba's uses grass-fed local beef topped with mustard and old-fashioned ketchup with relish and onions. Chili dogs, teriyaki burgers, taro burger, chicken sandwich and sides can be had. Also on tap are milk shakes and floats. Other locations in Koloa, and Hanalei.

Title: Bouchons
Content: Located upstairs in Ching Young Village, Bouchons provides sweeping views of Hanalei's mountains and waterfalls. Enjoy the popular ribs, fish and chips and grilled seafood entrees. Full selection of sushi and sake.

Title: The Mediterranean Gourmet
Content: Enjoy a relaxed atmosphere and amazing menu selections featuring Lebanese, French, Spanish, Italian and Greek influences. Vegetarian dinner entrees. Come for a leisurely lunch or a candlelit dinner. Located north of Hanalei at Hanalei Colony Resort.

Title: Kauai Grill
Content: Sweeping views of Hanalei Bay and Bali Hai surround Kauai Grill, a creative dining experience from Michelin awarded Jean-Georges Vongerichten. Open for dinner at the St. Regis Princeville Resort, Kauai Grill offers simple grilled preparations accompanied by bold condiments. Appetizers, side dishes and accompaniments hail from Chef Jean-Georges' portfolio of domestic and international restaurants. Vegetarian and gluten-free offerings.

Title: Nanea Restaurant and Bar
Content: Serving breakfast, lunch, dinner and Sunday brunch at The Westin Princeville Ocean Resort Villas, Nanea's overlooks the resort's waterfall. For dinner, diners can choose unique tasting options. The entre tasting offers smaller portions of two entrees like braised short ribs, roasted chicken and rib eye. The FIve Course Tasting Journey is paired with wines. Vegan and gluten-free offerings, keiki menu.

Title: Hideaways Pizza Pub
Content: Serving dinner nightly at the Pali Ke Kua condos, Hideways has starters like Almond Date Wraps, Brushcetta Fesca and Spinach Fondue. A variety of old- and new-school pizza offerings, plus build-your-own from 30 toppings can be had. Gluten-free pizza too. Other options include pastas like Linguini Napolitano and surf and turf entrees

Title: Lotus Garden Chinese & Thai Cuisine
Content: Located in Princeville Center, The Lotus Cafe offers takout that can be enjoyed at outdoor seating at the shopping center. Popular items are the Spicy Garlic Fish, won ton soup, drunken noodles and Pork Fried Rice. Lotus serves all the Chinese and Thai staples like Peking Duck Stir Fry, Orange Chicken, spring rolls and pad Thai.

Title: North Shore General Store
Content: Fill up your car and cooler, grab beach gear and a meal before hitting a beach on the North Shore. The food menu includes pizza, a variety of burgers nestled in a taro bunn, salads and cookies. Complete breakfast menu too, plus beer and wine.

Title: Tiki Iniki
Content: It's a party atmosphere at Princeville Center where the d'cor is vintage Hawaii. Guests are encourage to wear aloha attire. Lunch offers Asian chicken salad, burgers and wraps while dinner provides entrees like Pan seared Hawaiian Ahi or Monchong and Phyllo-Wrapped Kauai Chrimp served with pasta. Cocktails here are a must, like the Famous Flaming Zombie Bowl that serves up to six!

Title: Frederico's Fresh Mexican Cuisine
Content: Fredericos offers a variety each of burritos, tacos, ensaladas, tostadas and appetizers like nachos and taquitos. Burritos can be enjoyed with your choice of mojado style or traditional.Located in Princeville Center.

Title: Makana Terrace
Content: Breathtaking views of Hanalei Bay and the surrounding mountains awaits diners here for breakfast and morning buffet, plus dinner and sushi at the St. Regis Princeville. Dinner entrees include a seafood medley, Prosciutto Wrapped Mahi Mahi and beef ribeye. The weekend breakfast buffet is a real treat with a build-your-won Bloody Mary bar.

Title: Anara Spa
Content: Located in the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort, the 45,000-square-foot Anara Spa offers a full lineup of massages, body treatments and facials in rooms opening to their own tropical garden. The facility also has a StayFit gym, open-air yoga and fitness classes. Hair salon services too.

Title: Poipu Beach Surf School
Content: Poipu Beach Surf School Kauai Is owned and operated by professional waterman and former pro bodyboarder, Doug Muraoka. Staff are all lifeguard trained, CPR-certified, local watermen who have been surfing and teaching for years. Private, semi-private and group lessons for beginners, one-on-one sessions for intermediate surfers, and surf tour for advanced surfers at your choice of surf break. SUP lessons too.

Title: Kauai Surf School
Content: Kauai Surf School operates year-round to offer small group and private lessons for the beginner surfer, incorporating ocean knowledge and water safety. Also teaching keiki 12-and-under. Stand-up paddle lessons, surf clinics and Billabong Camps too.

Title: Kauai North Shore Surfing School
Content: North Shore offers surfing and stand-up paddleboard lessons, plus snorkeling tours. Surfing is in sandy-bottom Hanalei Bay and boasts a 99% success rate on beginner surf lessons. Private, group and family lessons. Also offering surfboard and SUP gear rentals.

Title: Poipu Bay Golf Course
Content: Location of the PGA Grand Slam of Golf from 1994-2006, Poipu Bay offers a challenging and scenic experience. Breathtaking views, native nene geese and humpback whales are natural distractions. In-cart stellite navigation system and Golf Shop located adjacent to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort & Spa.

Title: Kukuiolono Golf Course
Content: A nine-hole course that was donated to the people of Kauai by sugar plantation owner Walter McBryde. Enjoy sweeping views of Kauai's south and west shores. Par 36.

Title: Princeville Makai Golf Club
Content:
Come experience why National Geographic Traveler named Princeville Makai Golf Club one of the top five most scenic golf courses in the world. Enjoy oceanfront beauty, immaculate conditions with stunning mountain and ocean views. Luxurious golfing meets incredible scenery, great food and atmosphere.

   The Sunset Golf Cart Tour is a self-guided tour that takes you through six signature stops. Each has something to offer whether it be a story of Queen’s Bath or views of the North Shore peaks, Hı¯hı¯manu, Na¯molokama and Ma¯malahoa. 

   There are tours and clinics to observe and join as well. Enjoy weekly yoga, plus single, couple, junior and group lessons are also offered. Book your tee time and prepare for an incredible experience. Grab a delicious bite at The Makai Grill before or after your venture!

Title: Wailua Municipal Golf Course
Content: This 18-hole municipal course rivals its private counterparts and has been host to three USGA National Public Links Championships. Play starts and finishes along the ocean plus winds inland through coconut groves. Par 72.

Title: Makai Tennis
Content: Open to the public, Makai's tennis complex has four outdoor, hard-surface courts. Reserve a court in advance, proper athletic shoes required. Tennis instruction too.

Title: Hanalei Bay Resort Tennis
Content: Ranked one of the top 75 tennis resorts in the world, Hanalei Bay Resort offers action for players of all levels with four hard courts and four artificial turf, plus a Peter Burwash International (PBI) tennis facility. Activities include private lessons, clinics, mixers, tourneys, cardio tennis and ball machine workouts.

Title: Poipu Beach Athletic Club
Content: Family fun includes four USTA tennis courts, two basketball half courts, three pickleball courts, shuffleboard, resort pool, hot tub, water slide and sand-bottom pool, cardio center, open-air weight pavilion, Zen Den for yoga classes and aqua-aerobics instruction.

Title: Happy Talk Lounge
Content: Located at Hanalei Bay Resort, Happy Talk serves appetizers, salads, wraps, burgers and pizza, plus beer, wine and cocktails. Nightly entertainment with Sunday jazz jam.
lp_listingpro_options: a:32:{s:12:"tagline_text";s:40:"Restaurant and bar in Princeville, Kauai";s:8:"gAddress";s:40:"5380 Honoiki Road, Princeville, HI 96722";s:8:"latitude";s:10:"22.2196322";s:9:"longitude";s:12:"-159.4937352";s:6:"mappin";s:0:"";s:5:"phone";s:12:"808-431-4084";s:8:"whatsapp";s:0:"";s:5:"email";s:0:"";s:7:"website";s:30:"http://www.happytalklounge.com";s:7:"twitter";s:0:"";s:8:"facebook";s:0:"";s:8:"linkedin";s:0:"";s:7:"youtube";s:0:"";s:9:"instagram";s:0:"";s:5:"video";s:0:"";s:7:"gallery";s:0:"";s:12:"price_status";s:6:"notsay";s:10:"list_price";s:0:"";s:13:"list_price_to";s:0:"";s:7:"Plan_id";s:2:"53";s:16:"lp_purchase_days";s:0:"";s:11:"reviews_ids";s:0:"";s:15:"claimed_section";s:11:"not_claimed";s:26:"listings_ads_purchase_date";s:0:"";s:30:"listings_ads_purchase_packages";s:0:"";s:4:"faqs";a:2:{s:3:"faq";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}s:6:"faqans";a:1:{i:1;s:0:"";}}s:14:"business_hours";s:0:"";s:11:"campaign_id";s:0:"";s:14:"changed_planid";s:0:"";s:19:"listing_reported_by";s:0:"";s:16:"listing_reported";s:0:"";s:13:"business_logo";s:0:"";}

Title: Roberts of Kauai
Content: In business since 1946, Roberts features a full line of Hawaiian Heirloom jewelry in the tradition of Hawaiian royalty, Tahitian black pearls, koa wood jewelry, floral designs like plumeria and bird of paradise, wedding bands and engagement rings. Also offering women's clothing and accessories, men's dress and aloha shirts. Second location in Hanapepe, 808-335-5332.

Title: Talk Story Bookstore
Content: Billed as the western-most independent bookstore in the 50 states, Talk Story stocks new, secondhand and out-of-print books. Located in the Old Yoshiura Store.

Title: Keiki Kovers
Content: Find handmade bright and tropical apparel and accessories for infants, toddlers and young boys and girls aged six months to 8.

Title: The Bright Side Gallery
Content: Bright Side displays the works of several artists who showcase Kauai's beauty "in a playful, bright and unpretentious way."

Title: Kapaia Stitchery
Content: Find a large variety of fabrics, quilting and needlepoint supplies, finished quilts, alohawear clothing for adults and children, custom-made shirts and Kauai-made crafts. Offering 39 years of experience.

Title: Kukui Grove Shopping Center
Content: Centrally located, Kauai's largest mall offers over 55 shops and restaurants with both Mainland U.S. and unique Kauai retailers and restaurants. Hair salon and nail services. Shuttle service to Nawailiwili Harbor, Kauai Marriott and Kauai Beach Resort.

Title: Kauai Village Shopping Center
Content: A 100,000-square-foot shopping center with over 40 shops and restaurants built in a plantation architectural style. Anchored by Safeway supermarket and Longs Drugs, the center has an open-air court with landscaped ponds.

Title: Alii Kula Lavender Farm
Content:
Daily tours of the lavender farm filled with fragrance and beauty in Maui's cool upcountry. Shop full line of lavender bath, body and culinary products. The Kula Lavender Farm is easy on the vacationer’s budget. Admission is only $3 per person—free if you bring a copy of This Week Maui and mention this story—and daily guided walking tours are only $12, with a $2 discount for those who book online. Ali’i kula lavender will be open to the public only on Friday’s, Saturday’s, Sunday’s and Monday’s for the foreseeable future, with new hours from 10am to 4pm. General Admission is $3 per person, with a $1 off for Seniors, Military, and Kama’aina. Alternatively, we support the Maui Food Bank as an official drop-off location – with a donation of one non-perishable food item per person, admission will be waived.
Farm Hours: Friday, Saturday, Sunday and Monday, 10am to 4pm

Title: Aloha Mixed Plate
Content: Focusing on fare that hails from the varied ethnic groups that call Hawaii home, Mixed Plate serves breakfast, lunch and dinner with a million dollar view. Local favorites include kalbi ribs, chow mein, Asian chicken salad, chow funn with black bean sauce, shoyu chicken and kalua pork and cabbage. Cocktails, beer and wine.

Title: Cafe O'Lei Restaurants
Content: Located upstairs at Rainbow Mall in Kihei, Cafe O'Lei also has other Maui locations. Serving lunch and dinner, raw bar available Fri.-Sun., sushi for dinner Tues.-Sat. Brick oven flatbreads, specialty appetizers like ahi-stuffed calamari, prime rib, cajun jumbo shrimp and Asian-style braised shortribs.

Title: Da Kitchen Cafe
Content: Dig into "local-style grinds" at this low-key eatery serving spam musubi, fried pork mandoo, teriyaki burger, fish tempura sandwich, chicken katsu plate lunch, Hawaiian plates and mocos. You won't leave hungry for lunch or dinner. Other location in Kahului.

Title: Down the Hatch
Content:
VOTED Best Bar on Maui 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020! Featured on DINERS, DRIVE-INS, & DIVES on the Food Network!

Down The Hatch - A Place To Eat Fish, opened in June 2015 by 3 childhood friends from Georgia. Food is locally sourced with an emphasis on fresh fish from Lahaina Harbor, seafood, and southern specialties like the Shrimp Po’Boy and Chicken N’ Waffles. They bring their unique style of Southern Aloha to Maui cuisine! Known for their Lobster & Crab Stuffed Grilled Cheese and our spicy Lava Lava Shrimp. Named the Best Bar on Maui (2017, 2018, 2019, 2020) for not only the drinks, but the incredible food and atmosphere!

Located in the courtyard of the Wharf in Lahaina across from the Banyan Tree. Serving Breakfast, Lunch, Happy Hour, Dinner & Late Night. Walk-ins only, no reservations. Counter service y'all!

Longest Happy Hour on Maui with Live Music. 15% off all appetizers, $4.5 beers | $5.5 well cocktails | $5.5 mai tai, pina colada, lava flow, margarita, daiquiri

Family Friendly, ask for our Kid’s Menu at the Counter. We have a koi pond with fish & turtles for kids to enjoy. Free Mini Shave Ice at Breakwall Shave Ice Co. when you get a Keiki Meal at Down the Hatch! 15% Off at Breakwall with your DTH Receipt.

Parking & Transportation: The Wharf parking lot on Luakini St., or Bus & Starwood Shuttle drop-off at The Wharf

Visit their website for more information and hours of operation.

Down the Hatch also caters! Bring them on for wedding rehearsals, receptions, or after parties, special events, birthdays, and more! www.dthmaui.com/catering. When your wedding venue closes, they're the place to bring the party! Late Night Wedding Party packages, include Food, Drinks, & DJ!

Title: Feast at Lele
Content: Journey to ancient Hawaii, Aotearoa, Tahiti and Samoa during the Feast at Lele, a Polynesian dinner show in Lahaina. Featuring a sit-down dinner of five epicurean courses from the four Pacific island locations.

Title: Finest Kind Sportfishing
Content: Capt. Dave has been at the helm since 1973 at this third-generation company that consistently holds the catch records for the three islands of Maui County. Anglers will appreciate tournament-quality tackle and the crew's extensive knowledge of the fishing grounds out of Lahaiana. Private and shared charters.

Title: Kapalua Golf Courses & Academy
Content:
Kapalua Golf invites you to discover two of the most majestic golf courses in the world - The Bay Course and The Plantation Course, where the PGA champions come to play. Kapalua Golf Academy is a state-of-the-art instructional golf school and practice facility.

Built around the rugged beauty of the West Maui mountain range, and home to the Hyundai Tournament of Champions, the Plantation Course ranks among the world’s greatest courses.

Featuring uninterrupted views of the blue Pacific and rolling green fairways, the Bay Course is popular with both amateur and avid golfers alike.
Image Caption: KAPALUA, MAUI, HI - JANUARY 6: A course scenic shot of the 18th hole during the final round of the Hyundai Tournament of Champions at Plantation Course at Kapalua on January 6, 2014 in Kapalua, Maui, Hawaii. (Photo by Stan Badz/PGA TOUR) *** Local Caption ***

Title: Kimo's
Content: Seafood, steaks and grog is the motto of this oceanside restaurant in the heart of Lahaina town. Choose from dining room and outdoor lanai bar menus big on just-caught fish. Burgers are divine concocted with a proprietary blend of meat cuts. Can't beat the hula pie either!

Title: Koa's Seaside Grill
Content: It's like you're sitting over the water at Koa's, where you can stop for a relaxing tropical drink and dessert, or a full-on hearty breakfast, lunch or dinner. Happy hour, bar menu and offerings for kids too. Don't miss the incredible Koa's Pie, made with a macnut graham cracker crust, Maui's Roselani banana and vanilla ice cream, bananas, caramel and chocolate.

Title: Kula Botanical Garden
Content: Sprawling eight acres on the slopes of Haleakala, Kula Botanical Garden has colorul plants, amazing rock formations, a covered bridge, waterfalls, koi pond, aviary and a carved tiki exhibit.

Title: Kula Lodge & Restaurant
Content: Take the scenic drive to upcountry Maui for breakfast, lunch or dinner at Kula Lodge. Offering panoramic Maui views, the air is cool and crisp. The lodge is home to a marketplace, gift shop and gallery.

Title: Leilani's on the Beach
Content: Located at Whaler's Village on Kaanapali Beach, Leilani's has both a casual grill and dining room menus to satisfy your every culinary whim. The early evening Chef's Tasting Menu is a real treat. Ingredients are sourced from over 40 family owned farms.

Title: Mala Ocean Tavern
Content:
Grown with Aloha, Made with Aloha, Served with Aloha.

Mala Ocean Tavern is an oceanfront eatery located on Front Street in Lahaina, Hawaii on the island of Maui. Featuring island influenced cuisine created by award winning Chef Alvin Savella. MALA opened in 2004, and has been a staple of the Lahaina food scene, gaining momentum in the last few years under new ownership and with the incredible up and coming Chef Savella. MALA has quickly become one of the hottest spots to dine on the island of Maui.

Featuring MALA signature dishes and culinary creativity focused on fresh locally sourced fish, seafood, and thoughtful island inspired cuisine. Known for exciting culinary cocktails and an exceptional wine list, MALA’s outstanding staff will help you find the perfect pair for Chef Alvin’s inventive cuisine.

Voted Best Oceanfront Dining on Maui, sit seaside while dining on fresh local fare and enjoy watching the sea turtles (honu) splashing in the waves. Reservations recommended, walk-ins welcome!

Friday & Saturday Late Night features Chef Alvin Savella’s RAW FISH & WAGYU Menu from 10p ‘til Midnight https://malatavern.com/late-night-menu No Reservations needed. Late Entertainment at MALA on the weekends with Live Music, DJs, and more! See the MALA Calendar at www.malatavern.com to get more details.

Learn more about Chef Alvin Savella: https://malatavern.com/news/mala-welcomes-chef-alvin-savella.

Title: Scotch Mist Sailing Charters
Content: Offering a full lineup of fun, Scotch Mist books morning snorkels and sails, afternoon sail and a sunset cruise. The Scotch Mist II, a Santa Cruz 50 sailing yacht, was built in 1982 for racing and she is the fastest production line sailboat of her size in the world.

Title: Sunshine Helicopters
Content: A statewide helicopter flightseeing operation, Sunshine has several tour options from Maui. Explore Haleakala and the isolated Hana pools and rainforest, see the entire Valley Isle with a Circle Island Tour or fly over West Maui enroute to neighboring Molokai to view the world's steepest sea cliffs, Hawaii's tallest waterfalls and St. Damien's monument at Kalaupapa.

Title: The Plantation House Restaurant
Content: Serving breakfast, lunch, dinner and a grill menu, The Plantation House in Kapalua sits on the Plantation Golf Course, home of PGA play. Spectacular ocean views of Molokai treat diners feasting on macadamia-nut crusted fish, tenderloin, short ribs and chicken. Tasting menu offers wine pairings.

Content: Whale watches include narration, underwater hydrophones, every seat is a front row seat with 18-passenger maximum. Departing Lahaina Harbor, the Lanai Snorkel Tour visits three sites. Also available are VIP tours and Maui fishing.

Title: Valley Isle Excursions
Content: Offering comfy (reclining chairs), guided transport along the Heavenly Road to Hana with its hair-pin turns and one-lane-bridges, Valley Isle makes the road getting there fun. Relax and enjoy the view of waterfalls and rainforest. Head to Maui's isolated backside, Kaupo Gap. Personalized lunches, stops for photo ops.

Title: cj
Content: Coast down Haleakala volcano on a guided bicycle tour. Summit-to-sea fun includes hotel pickup and drop off, guided van tour of the summit of Haleakala National Park, all gear and jacket/gloves provided. No-host meal stop in scenic upcountry Maui. Sunrise and morning trips.

Title: Robbie's Maui Surf Lessons
Content: It's guaranteed you'll stand up and surf on your first lesson with Robbie's Surf Lessons. Instruction begins on the beach before heading to the ocean. Soft surfboard, rashguard and booties provided. Fun for all ages.

Title: Makawao Steak House
Content: A Makawao town institution serving hand-crafted cocktails, salad bar with house-made dressings, Hawaii Rancher's New York Steak, prime rib, Jidor Chicken and vegetarian offerings.

Content: With five locations on Maui, Maui's Tacos serves breakfast, tacos, burritos, chimichangas, quesadillas, taco salads and its signature Maui Mex Bowls. For dessert, enjoy fried ice cream and Banana Chingalingas using Maui's own Roselani brand. Full line of salsas, including pineapple.

Title: Ocean Vodka Tours
Content: Learn about sustainable farming practices for sugar cane at the Ocean Vodka Organic Farm and Distillery that uses solar panels to power its facility. Visit The Martin Garden with local ingredients like Lavender, passionfruit, pineapple and local fruit. For those over the age of 21, tour includes sampling with take-home shot glass. Tours are daily.

Title: Surfing Goat Dairy
Content: An agritourism experience for the whole family, Surfing Goat Dairy is recognized by its driveway lined with old surfboards and green pastures. This family-run dairy features farm tours, a petting/feeding zoo and goat cheese factory. There are over 100 goats of all sizes, dogs, cats and a potbelly pig to delight the children. Casual, 20-minute tours are offered 10 a.m.-3 p.m.daily. Evening chores and milking tour starts at 3:15 p.m. Monday-Saturday. Take the Grand Dairy tour to taste 20 varieties of gourmet soft cheese from the factory on Saturdays at 9 a.m.

Title: Maui Brewing Company
Content: Take a daily tour of Maui Brewing Company for an up-close look at the brewhaus, cellar and packaging tour. Guided tour includes beer tastings, souvenir glass and a token for a full beer. Tasting room is open 11 a.m.-10 p.m. daily. Brewpub in Kahana serves all the beers plus burgers, salads, flatbreads, shared plates and keiki menu.

Title: Lahaina Fish Company
Content: Fresh Hawaii fish is served here and the menu explains the attributes of all varieties. Lahaina Fish Company offers seafood prepared a variety of ways, plus a full selection of salads, sides, prime rib and fire-roasted bison. The signature appetizer is the Ahi Katsu-not to be missed! Keiki menu.

Title: Longhi's Front Street Kitchen
Content: Established in 1976, Longhi's has a reputation for outstanding food, music and dancing in Historic Lahaina Town. Hot an cold appetizers; Longhi classics like clam linguine, lobster salad and New York-Style Rubens; piizas; burgers and desserts like macadamia nut pie ala mode. Other location in Kihei.

Title: Hawaii Fudge Company
Content: Indulge your sweet tooth with handmade confections from The Hawaii Fudge Company. Their selection of fresh treats includes fudge, toffee, caramel and taffy, all produced right here on Maui. With authentic Hawaiian flavor combinations like Lava Flow Fudge, Sea Salt Caramel, and White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Toffee, you’ll get to “experience the flavor of Hawaii in the palm of your hands.”

Title: Kelii's Kayak Tours
Content: It's fun for the family via an ocean adventure with Kelii's. Take a guided kayak tour, instructions included, to a premiere snorkel site. Enjoy a South Shore turtle adventure, A Maui sunset tour, an exploration of Maui's North Shore and more. Combine activites and learn to paddle, snorkel and surf all in one day.

Title: Blue Water Rafting
Content: Discover secret coves abundant with coral and marine life. Explore the sea caves and lava arches of Maui's rugged Kanaio Coast. See the Psychedelic Hallway or visit Molokini. Dolphin encounters, whale watching fun too.

Title: Maui Pacific Divers
Content: Dive charter to premium sites offshore Maui like First Cathedral and Fish Rock. Deli lunch. Rental gear, fast boat, friendly crew.

Content: Tee off in style with clubs, apparel and accessories from Roger Dunn. The worldwide golf shop company also stocks GPS finders and training aids.

Title: Maui Ocean Center
Content: Celebrating nearly two decades of caring for Hawaiʻi’s underwater world, Maui Ocean Center is dedicated to fostering understanding, wonder and respect for marine life. Offering 20 daily presentations, educational exhibits and various tours, Maui Ocean Center is truly the “Aquarium of Hawaiʻi.” Get up close with the inhabitants of Maui’s rich ocean environment when you stroll through the acrylic tunnel and observe the Open Ocean Exhibit, an expansive 750,000-gallon display of marine creatures. Enhance your experience at Maui Ocean Center with a special Behind-the-Scenes Tour, a visit to Turtle Lagoon or a Shark Dive Maui adventure. Don’t leave without exploring the Living Reef Exhibit, one of the world’s largest displays of rare and endemic Pacific corals.

Title: Spago
Content: Located at the Four Seasons Resort Maui, Spago features a fusion of Hawaii and California-inspired American cuisine using locally sourced ingredients. Intimate lounge area and bar. Men offers Wolfgang Puck classics and locally inspired dishes including Hana Hearts of Palm Salad, Hawaiian-style Ceviche of Opakapaka, Pan-Roasted Uku with Lobster Sauce Americana and Caramelized Pork Chop with Lomi Lomi Tomatoes.

Title: Mama's Fish House
Content: Open since 1973, this family owned restaurant serves lunch and dinner, featuring fish brought direct to the restaurant by local anglers. Enjoy a tropical, open-air, beachside setting while dining on fish prepared a variety of different ways using island ingredients. Signature items are Mama's Stuffed Mahimahi, Mama's mango chutney, prime beef short rib and island lobster tails. The fresh poi is complimentary.

Title: L & L Restaurant Maui
Content: Serving local-style food fast, L & L Hawaiian Barbecue restaurants have a wide selection of local-style plate lunches with your choice of entre, two scoops rice and potato/mac salad or green salad on the side. The Hawaiian barbecue beef is marinated with L & L's special teriyaki sauce. Fish combos, spam musubi, beef and pork plates, chili bowls with rice, loco moco, healthy plates with flash-fried fish, brown rice and green salad. Burgers too, including ramen burgers. Other locations available.

Title: The Maui Touring Company
Content: Take the Heavenly Road to Hana in a Cadillac Escalade Luxury Edition. The day starts with breakfast in Paia and a stop at Hookipa Beach before heading to Hana, a route with stunning coastal views, waterfalls, lush rainforest and plenty turns and one-lane bridges. In Hana, enjoy a gourmet lunch at the Hotel Hana Travaasa before heading along the dry, backside of Maui to Tedeschi Winery for free wine tasting. Then it's a scenic drive through Maui's upcountry to end the day. Other private tours available.

Title: Warren & Annabelle's
Content: Warren & Annabelle's is a favorite evening entertainment option in Lahaina, Maui. Enjoy four hours of mind-blowing, sleight-of-hand magic; hilarious comedy, gourmet appetizers, dessert and cocktails. No two shows are alike.

Title: Paradise Eco-Adventures
Content:
Fly on the fast zipline and roll in the giant aquaball. It's a cross between a water slide and a roller coaster. Paradise Eco-Adventures offers kid and family friendly fun on Maui Dragonfruit Farm. Taste a variety of fresh fruit in season and learn about the history of West Maui agriculture, Hawaiian canoe plants and the farm's organic practices.

Book A Paradise Eco-Adventures Tour Today!

Tropical Fruit Tasting Walking Tour

The lush Hawaiian climate hosts a variety of delicious exotic tropical fruits, and this guided fruit tasting tour gives you the chance to discover some of its best. 

1 Hr.

DETAILS

Aquaball Fruit Tasting Tour

Rolling in the aquaball is one of the best things to do in Maui. Our awesome aquaball is wet, slippery and offers a unique way to have fun during your Maui vacation!

1.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Zipline Fruit Tasting Tour

Looking for a fun way to spend an afternoon in Maui? Visit the Maui Dragon Fruit Farm, the perfect location for a thrilling zip line ride.

1.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Zipline & Aqauball Combo Fruit Tasting Tour

Our best value adventure tour! Enjoy zip-lining and aquaballing in one excellent adventure package! 

2.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Title: Tiki Terrace Restaurant
Content: Sunday champagne brunch and dinner at the Kaanapali Beach Hotel. Complimentary music and hula show Tues-Sun. evening. Dinner offerings include Maui Onion Soup, Tuna Pohole Fern Salad, Grilled Shrimp Scampi, Kalbi Boneless Short Rib, and Hawaiian Laulau.

Title: Kula Country Farms
Content: Fresh produce and awesome island views can be had at this farm stand, which also offers u-pick strawberries and a fall pumpkin patch. Shop for fresh flowers, refreshing drinks, sauces, dressings, salts, honey, and fresh baked goodies including Kula Strawberry Jam and Syrup. Children's garden and friendly farm animals.

Content: Head upcountry to Ulupalakua to taste wine from grapes grown on the lofty slopes of Maui. Complimentary daily tasting at the King's Cottage with guided tours of the historic estate, production area and wine cellar two times daily. Wine sales and shipping.

Title: Hawaiian Moons Natural Foods
Content: Full service natural food store serving south Maui. Produce, groceries, frozen, chill case, supplements, health and beauty, chocolates and a Grab & Go Deli. Also serving hungry patrons is a Hot Bar buffet and salad bar.

Title: Mana Foods
Content: Wide variety of organic, ready-to eat food and groceries. Mana stocks bulk and raw foods ,specialty cheeses, produce, health and beauty items and groceries. Deli series fresh pasta, fish and meat, entrees, vegetarian dishes, salads, soups, pizza and desserts.

Title: Kupaa Farms
Content: Growing organic veggies, fruits and award-winning coffee on the slopes of Haleakala, Kupaa markets its bounty 8 a.m.-1 p.m. Weds. at Waipuna Chapel in Kula. Coffee and farm-made value-added products like lilikoi spread and sauerkraut can also be purchased online. Farm tours by appointment.

Title: Cuatro
Content: Latin and Pacific Rim flavors mingle in Cuatro's menu where dinner is served nightly. Spicy Tuna Nachos is a fave appetizer. Entrees included fresh catch prepared your choice of four ways, roasted chicken breastand marinated pork. Happy hour. Seating is limited, reservations suggested.

Title: Enchanted Floral Garden
Content: It's an eight-acre garden at a 2,500-foot elevation displaying 2,000 species of tropical and semi-tropical flora and fauna from across the globe. The garden is divided into a number of different zones and types of plants. The garden was planted in the early 1980's by a hybrid specialist from Japan. Coffee cafe.

Title: Bistro Molokini
Content: Located in the Grand Wailea, Bistro Molokini offers casual lunch, happy hour and dinner and is a great spot for watching sports or a quick bite between activities. Cuisine is a lighter fare and favorites include the Kalua Pork Flatbread from the wood-fire grill or the fish tacos.

Title: Kō Restaurant
Content: Expansive menu features island family recipes that have been passed down through generations of sugarcane workers, including Hawaiian, Chinese, Filipino, Portuguese, Korean and Japanese favorites. Fine dining restaurant in The Fairmont, Kea Lani in Wailea.

Title: Pulehu-An Italian Grill
Content: Meaning "grilled" in Hawaiian, Pulehu serves Italian classics and more: Flat Iron Grilled Bread, Braised Short Rib Tagliatelle, Hawaiian snapper, chicken marsala, Spaghettini & Meatball and a wagyu beef ribeye will a mushroom risotto and melted foie gras brussels sprouts. Italian desserts and gelatos. Enjoy whiskey on the rocks with the Macallan Ice Sphere.

Title: Maui Grown Coffee Company
Content: Visit the Maui Grown store to sample and purchase coffees grown on the Kaanapali Estate. Also selling both green and roasted coffee, plus Kona coffee.

Content: Choose from a variety of tours that gets you acquainted with Maui's agricultural operations. Tours cover several commodities: pineapple, lavender, livestock, vegetables, exotic flowers including protea, goat cheese, vodka made from sugar cane, dragonfruit and coffee.

Title: Migrant
Content: Located at the Wailea Beach Marriott, Migrant offers a stylish take on Filipino fare with offerings like Pancit Noodles and Tocino-Filipino Sweet Pork. Dig into the Hand-Cut Fat Show Funn, the Mean Kine Ramen and the Tone Katsu.

Title: The Mill House
Content: Serving lunch and dinner daily amid the lush grounds of the plantation. Food features ingredients selected from field and row within the plantation and from select farmers and providers. Enjoy small plates and sandwiches for lunch; appetizers, small plates, pizzettes, pasta and entrees like pork loin and Chickpea Panisse for dinner.

Title: The Wooden Crate at Lumeria Maui
Content: The Wooden Crate celebrates the variety of local food and its nutritional potency. Dine overlooking gardens in the courtyard lanai or watch the sunset on the covered back terrace. Lunch can be packed to go.

Content: Serving classic food truck favorites in an open-air setting at the Westin Kaanapali. Live music some evenings.

Title: Whole Food Market Maui
Content: Full-service natural foods store with departments for bakery, beer/wine, bulk, cheese, cofees, floral, frocery, mealt, prepared foods, produce, seafood, whole body and pets.

Title: Coconut's Fish Cafe
Content:
Fresh, delicious and generous at reasonable prices are an automatic draw to any popular eatery, and Coconut’s Fish Cafe clicks all the buttons. 

“My wife Carol and I have visited Hawai‘i, in general, for over 20 years, but have always loved Kaua‘i, the best of all the islands,” declares owner LaMont Fisher. “We found Coconut’s during one of our visits to Maui and knew it would be a great fit for Kaua‘i due to quality and cost. We wanted to open a place on Kaua‘i that most could afford.” It was also their dream to live on the Garden Isle. Who can blame them?

Coconut’s has garnered 4.5-plus star ratings on Yelp and TripAdvisor. They’ve also received accolades from Zagat, Travel + Leisure magazine and were featured on CNN’s list of “Top 10 Places to Eat Like a Local.” Fisher says their Fish Taco (one of their most popular menu items) was recently rated the #17 taco throughout the nation by BigSevenTravel.com. It’s made with 17 ingredients consisting of seven layers and textures, and a mixture of grilled mahi mahi and ono.

Pressed to see which is his favorite dish, Fisher replies, “Blackened Mahi Mahi. It provides a perfect seasoning to mahi mahi without overpowering the taste of the fish.”

More than anything, Fisher guarantees a quality meal in a great setting served by the most friendly staff, so be sure to stop by!

Title: Maui Fish 'n Chips
Content: Serving award-winning fish, chicken and chips (fried or grilled), plus a vareity of specialty fries, fried mushrooms and onion rings. Family size tubs available. Located in Dolphin Plaza.

Title: Chez Meme Bistro & Bakery
Content: Serving breakfast and lunch in the garden or open-air cottage. Chez Meme specializes in french country food: freshly baked brioche, omeletes, montagnarde, beef bourguignon, quiche, provencale, cordon blue and local favorites with a European twist.

Title: Ululani's Shave Ice
Content: With multiple locations in Lahaina, Kihei, Wailuku and Kahului, Ululani's uses perfected recipes for over 45 flavors ranging from almond to wet lemon peel and Maui's Roselani's Ice Cream, homemade mochi, coconut and azuki bean add-ons. Specialty combos include root beer float, made with root beer, vanilla and a sweetened condensed cream.

Content: Organic salads, flatbreads for two with your choice of cheese, sausage and a host of toppings including island goat cheese and Maui pineapple, spinach and herbs. Title: Ruby Tuesday
Content: Offering burgers, sandwiches, salads, seasonal sides and flavorful entrees like Hickory Bourbon Salmon and Texas Dusted Baby Back Ribs. If you want it spicy, go Ragin' Cajun.

Title: Matteo's Osteria
Content: Matteo's is a traditional Hawaiian eatery serving fresh, regional specialties all the Italian menu items have extensive English descriptions. Fare includes both white and tomato pizzettes, fish and meats prepared Italian style, handmade pastas, salads and bambino menu. Wine bar featuring over 60 wines by the glass.

Title: Japengo - Hyatt Regency Maui Resort and Spa
Content: An award-winning Pacific Rim restaurant and sushi lounge, Japango - Hyatt Regency Maui Resort and Spa. Overlooking the resort's waterfalls and beach Japengo's is open for happy hour and dinner with nightly entertainment. Full line of sushi, sashimi and rolls, plus sides, salads, entrees and specials like Miso Glazed Salmon and Tengu Grilled Seafood Curry Bowl. Some menu items are available in half portions.

Title: Coconut Glen's
Content: Vegan ice cream made from coconut milk. Flavors like lychee, ginger lemongrass, chili chocolate and lavender.

Title: Gerard's
Content: Located at the charming Plantation Inn, Gerard's offers seating in air-conditioned comfort, outside on the verdana or in the garden. Gerard's has received Wine Spectator's "Award of Excellence" for the past 19 years. Enjoy fresh fish, meat and poultry prepared with a French flair, plus appetizers, salads and soups. Desserts include chef's tropical sorbets and puffy profiteroles with Maui Best honey ice cream and hot chocolate sauce.

Title: Lahaina Pizza Company
Content: Deep-dish pizza, specialty sandwiches using house-baked rolls and tropical drinks can be had at this upstairs restaurant overlooking the ocean. Also enjoy salads, plus pastas like linguine with clam sauce and fettuccini alfredo.

Title: Duke's Beach House
Content: Dine in or out at this open-air eatery that celebrates the legacy of Hawaii's famous waterman. Full menu for lunch, breakfast and dinner. Island preparations include the banana-leaf steamed island fish and shrimp or the slow-roasted baby back ribs covered in mango barbecue sauce.

Title: Capt Jack's Island Grill
Content: Known for its Philly cheesesteak and fish preparations, this pirate-themed eatery serves lunch and dinner daily and breakfast on the weekends. Specialties include the Kracken Calamari and passionfruit, beer battered fish and chips. Appetizers, sandwiches and salads too. Located in the Wharf Cinema Center with nightly entertainment.

Title: Duo Steak & Seafood
Content: Located poolside with an ocean view at The Four Seasons Resort Maui at Wailea, Duo serves daily breakfast and breakfast buffet, plus dinner nightly. Open kitchen atmosphere where steak and seafood dishes are prepared, like crispy local snapper and dry-aded rib eye.

Title: Sea House Restaurant
Content: Located at Napili Kai Beach Resort, this full-service, open-air restaurant and bar serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. Dinner offerings include island fish prepared a variety of ways, plus Italian Huil Huli Lamb Chops, center cut filet mignon and Porcini Mushroom Ravioli. Early bird and nightly dinner specials. Nightly entertainment.

Title: Maui Mall
Content: Eat, shop, and play in paradise at Maui Mall! Located just five minutes from the airport and across the street from Kahului Harbor, Maui Mall offers premier retailers as well as local and national brands. Enjoy the very best in restaurants, services, retail vendors and entertainment. Plus enjoy major events and celebrations throughout the year!

Title: Pedal Bike Tours
Content: Get out in the fresh air and see Oahu the good ole fashioned wayon a bike! Pedal Bike Tours offers bike rentals and guided tours of Waikiki, Honolulu and the North Shore geared toward novice riders of any age at any fitness level. Learn about the intriguing histories of Honolulu and Waikiki via a casual ride or opt for a full day of fun out on the North Shore with biking and swimming, plus lunch at a popular shrimp truck.

Title: Novictor Aviation
Content: A helicopter tour is an experience you'll always remember, and Novictor Aviation will make sure of it. The friendly crew will make you feel at home while the knowledgeable pilots are ready to share their passion for the Aloha State with tidbits of Hawaiian folklore, history, flora, fauna and the environment throughout the flight. Daytime, sunset and night time flights offer varied sights that include incredible views of pristine beaches, world-famous landmarks, spectacular sunsets or the twinkling skyline. Choose from 15 to 60-minute tours. Aerial photography and flight instruction are also available. Tours daily.

Title: Holokai Catamaran
Content: Step off the sands of Waikiki right onto the Holokai Catamaran for a fun sailing experience either day or night for a reasonable price. Go snorkeling and spy turtles, sea urchins and more on the Turtle Canyon Adventure Sail or simply enjoy a ride along the coastline for views stretching from Waikiki Natatorium to Diamond Head Lighthouse. The Sunset Sail is by far the most popular, perfect for relaxing as you take in the warm colors of the sunset on the horizon; drinks included too! Every Friday, catch the fireworks as close as you can get from the water off of the Hilton Hawaiian Village. Rides available daily.

Title: Paradise Watersports
Content: Head out from the Ala Wai Boat Harbor and soar like a bird high above the Pacific Oceanup to 1,000 feet with Paradise Watersports. They've been awarded the Certificate of Excellence by TripAdvisor, and reviewers wholeheartedly agree that their experiences were excellent. Get prepped with a safety briefing, then you're ready for deployment up into the wild blue yonder! In the air, dangle your feet above amazing views of Honolulu, Waikiki and the landmark Diamond Head! Outings available daily.

Title: Kailua Beach Adventures
Content:
Kailua Beach Adventures (KBA) is conveniently located across from Kailua Beach and specializes in kayak tours and stand up paddling lessons and rentals. Their multi-room facility includes a large retail floor, several briefing rooms, a learning center, free parking, showers, lockers and dressing rooms. Enjoy kayaking in Kailua Bay's pristine turquoise waters, visit offshore island seabird sanctuaries and paddle through sea-turtle feeding grounds. Guided eco-tours are available to the famed Mokulua (Twin) Islands and Popoiʻa (Flat) Island. Tours include free hotel pick-up in Waikiki, lunch and snorkeling. KBA provides experiences for all skill levels, with a focus on eco-friendly and sustainable adventures. They have a perfect 5 Star rating on Trip Advisor and have won multiple awards from their work with beach cleanups and preservation work.  Equipment rentals include kayak and paddle boards, beach chairs, snorkel gear, full-face Ninja snorkel masks and body boards.

Walk-ins welcome for rentals, but reservations recommended. Tours and lessons require a reservation. Call or stop by the only company within walking distance of Kailua Beach and let the professionals help plan an adventure for you.

Title: Aqua Zone Scuba Diving & Watersports Center
Content:
The skilled Aqua Zone staff at Waikiki Beach Marriott Resort & Spa is ready to share with you their passion for scuba diving and help you experience amazing underwater adventures. Visit turtles on a snorkel or scuba diving adventure, dive Oahu's popular wrecks or get nose to snout with sharks. Not certified? No worries. Aqua Zone is the only dive shop offering free scuba lessons in the pool and scuba classes in the open water. Equipment rentals are also available. Ask about shark cage adventures too. 

Book An Aqua Zone Scuba Diving Adventure Today!

Sea Turtle Scuba/Snorkel Adventure

Great dive/ snorkel trip for the beginner diver, rusty diver and a fun adventure for snorkelers.

4 Hrs.

Ages 12+

Ages 2+

rank_math_title: Aqua Zone Scuba Diving & Snorkeling | This Week Hawaii
rank_math_description: The skilled Aqua Zone Scuba Diving staff is ready to share with you their passion for scuba diving and help you experience underwater adventures.

Title: Bike Hawaii
Content: Bike Hawaii's commitment is for you to experience Oahu's best via Rainforest to Reef adventures accompanied by genuine aloha and exceptional service. Check out downhill biking, hiking, mountain biking, kayaking, sailing or snorkeling that take you from one end of the island to the other. Tours daily.

Title: Ko Olina Ocean Adventures
Content:
The friendly and accommodating crew of Ko Olina Ocean Adventures is ready to take you out for a day of snorkeling at two snorkel sites in the Pacific Ocean on Oahu's west side. Whether by speedboat or catamaran, the ride is half the fun as the crew provides instruction, safety information and a huge dose of enthusiasm to make sure you enjoy your experience. Snorkel or SNUBA with a vibrant community of marine life, as well as dolphins and Hawaiian green sea turtles. Prescription masks available too.

Book A Ko Olina Ocean Adventure Today!

Catamaran Sail & Snorkel Tour - Afternoon Sail

Set anchor at one fabulous snorkel reef teeming with tropical reef fish, fascinating marine life, and frequent visits from friendly Hawaiian green sea turtles.

3 Hrs.

DETAILS

Catamaran Sail & Snorkel Tour - Morning Sail

Your experienced catamaran Captain and crew are on the lookout for viewing encounters with playful Hawaiian spinner dolphins and seasonal Alaska humpback whales.

3 Hrs.

DETAILS

Sunset Sail from Ko Olina

Set sail from Ko Olina Marina located on the beautiful Ko Olina Resort along leeward Oahu’s picturesque coastline on a two-hour Sunset Catamaran Sail on the lovely Holole’a kai.

3 Hrs.

DETAILS
