Title: Hoku Hawaii Tours Honolulu
Content: THE WORD HOKU MEANS STAR in the Hawaiian language. It was by the stars that the ancient Polynesian navigators sailed to the islands of Hawaii. We at Hoku Hawaii Tours wish to be your navigators to the beauty of Hawaii. Our luxury vehicles are customized to make your journey as comfortable as possible, and we offer many amenities to enhance your experience with us. Our navigators and staff are profoundly knowledgeable about Hawaii’s ancient culture, rich history, mythology, and more. Allow us to guide and immerse you in the true beauty of Hawaii and its culture while you explore the islands with us.

Title: Maverick Helicopters - Maui
Content: You haven’t seen Maui unless you’ve seen it from the best view possible – the sky. Miles of pristine coastline await you on exquisite tours departing from Maverick’s Kahului Heliport in Maui. Whether it is the Haleakala Crater, the Hana Rainforest, or the sea cliffs of Molokai you’re sure to experience a one-of-a-kind adventure on a helicopter tour of Maui.

Title: Honolua Store
Content: Located on the grounds of the beautiful Kapalua Resort ~ A landmark since the days of pineapple farming on Maui, the Honolua Store offers a variety of gifts and apparel, a nice selection of fine wines and spirits, cosmetics, groceries and features a full-service espresso bar and fresh deli service – in a historic plantation setting. Enjoy traditional Hawaiian-style plate lunches such as the popular Loco Moco, fresh gourmet Sandwiches, Salads and Pizzas, golden Fried Chicken, the famous Honolua Burger – and much more. Start your day with breakfast on the lanai with free wi-fi, relax with a cup of Kona’s best coffee from our Island Gourmet Coffee Bar or grab a meal to-go with you as you explore Maui. Daily Specials such as Herb Roasted Prime Rib on Thursdays are served.

Title: Island Gourmet Markets at The Shops of Wailea
Content: Island Gourmet Markets. A Lifestyle market and gift shop for all ~ Delight your senses and invigorate your spirit. We, at Island Gourmet Markets pride ourselves in bringing the freshest foods direct from Hawaii’s farmers whenever possible. Shop with ease and choose from gourmet items from Hawaii and around the world. Food and Wine lovers unite. Enjoy our exquisite deli, nice selection of fine wines and spirits, or relax with a cup of Kona’s best coffee from our Island Gourmet Coffee Bar. Browse through our large selection of local and logo apparel, beach needs, drugs and cosmetics, gifts and souvenirs ~ just about everything you’ll need. Come to Island Gourmet Markets where quality and friendly service welcomes you with Aloha.

Title: Hawaii Land Realty
Content:
For nearly 40 years, Hawaiʻi Land Realty Corp is a family-owned and operated realty company that has cultivated relationships within the Hawaiʻi Island community. We dedicate ourselves to helping our clients find the perfect home. We at Hawaiʻi Land Realty believe in honesty, integrity and hard work.

Byron Mathews RB

Byron Matthews is the Broker in Charge at Hawaii Land Realty and has been working with the company, a family business since he was a teenager.  In 2007 he was licensed as a Realtor and has been helping people buy and sell homes ever since.  Byron is involved in many aspects of Realestate, including new home construction, home renovation and professional photography.

Byron was born and raised in Hawaii and when he’s not working heenjoys surfing, fishing, camping and traveling.

Title: Island Country Market - Kauai
Content: An Island Lifestyle market and gift shop in one. At Island Country Markets – we pride ourselves in offering you our full-service deli. Fresh, crisp salads and tasty gourmet sandwiches, flatbread pizzas with local plate lunch specials daily ~ such as our flavorful Herb Roasted Prime Rib on Thursdays. Include an impressive collection of fine wines and spirits, a great selection of gourmet meats and cheeses, fresh fruits and vegetables alongside a large selection of local and logo apparel, daily needs, groceries, drugs and cosmetics, gifts and souvenirs ~ just about everything you’ll need.

Title: Kayak Wailua
Content:
Explore Polynesia’s only navigable stream on our fully equipped, stable, comfortable, and quality single, double, and triple kayaks. On your kayak adventure, you meander 2 miles upstream, where you first pass an old Hawaiian Village. Secure your kayak at an island in the north fork and continue your expedition on foot through the pristine canyons and tropical rainforest of the Wailua River Valley interior to Secret Falls, a.k.a. Uluwehi Waterfalls.

No previous experience is necessary. There is usually little or no current occurring. Paddling upstream can actually be easier than downstream as you are assisted by a gentle tradewind blowing mauka (inland) toward the mountains.

Join us for the best-valued activity on one of Kauai’s top attractions. Over a five-hour period, you paddle the placid warm waters of Wailua, hike through a lush rainforest, and swim at a secluded waterfall. Our family-run business keeps your family in mind with top-quality equipment at affordable prices.

Title: Kauai Plantation Railway
Content: Welcome aboard any of our three conductor narrated authentic train tours of the historic 105 acre Kilohana Plantation. Sit back and relax in our elegant mahogany passenger cars as you tour and see the tropical beauty and bounty Kilohana. There is no better train tour or more historic and beautiful setting in the entire State of Hawaii. We guarantee that your entire Kilohana Plantation Experience will be one of your most memorable vacation events. Please come and join us!

Title: Market City Shopping Center
Content:
Waikiki, Honolulu’s main visitor destination, is exciting with so much to see and do. But if you’re interested in eating and shopping local, just two miles away is Market City Shopping Center, a friendly neighborhood haven for more than 73 years. 

At Market City, you’ll discover Foodland, Hawaii’s first supermarket, well-stocked with a range of specialty foods, from fresh papayas and pineapples, Hawaiian poke (seasoned raw seafood), to its own Maika‘i brand of jams and flavored butters, chocolates and cookies, and condiments and sauces, that are perfect to take home. HouseMart Ben Franklin Crafts has a varied assortment of memory keeping craft ideas to capture your Hawaii vacation. And one of the best ways to enjoy and experience local culture is through food. With Hawaii’s melting pot of ethnic flavors, Market City’s restaurant crawl features local, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Thai, Vietnamese, and Italian cuisines. Among the standouts are the award-winning Café Kaila, known for its classic as well as local breakfast fare, with all dishes made from scratch, or the new Mezzo Bistro & Bar serving up contemporary Italian-American fusion cuisine complemented by a curated list of wines, beers and whiskeys. Other Market City musts: Hawaii Sushi for its gourmet sushi at affordable prices in a fast-casual setting; Donut King for its fresh and delicious donuts; and Fujioka’s Wine Times, known not only for its vast selection of wines but also sake, spirits, fine cigars, and chilled beverages. 

Market City Shopping Center Restaurants

  • Anytime Cafe
  • Café Kaila
  • Da Best Pho
  • Donut King
  • Duck Lee
  • Gina’s BarBQ
  • Hawaii Sushi
  • L & L Hawaiian Barbecue
  • Mezzo Bistro & Bar
  • Nabeya Maido
  • Sumo Ramen & Curry
  • Thai Issan Cuisine
  • The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf
  • Win-Spuntino Italian Café
  • Fun Station (coming soon) 

Market City Shopping Center Shops and Services

  • Adore Hair & Nails Salon
  • Foodland
  • Fujioka’s Wine Times
  • HouseMart Ben Franklin Crafts
  • Hui Car Share
  • KJ’s Hairstyling
  • Kaimuki Self Storage
  • T-Mobile
  • The TreeHouse TeaHouse

How to Get to the Market City Shopping Center

Title: Hawaiian Smiles Orthodontics
Content: We offer an extensive range of appliances and orthodontic options for children, teens, and adults, including traditional metal and ceramic braces, and the revolutionary Invisalign system. Invisalign uses a series of clear plastic trays, or aligners, to correct mild to moderate alignment issues. We also offer high-tech Pitts-21 self-ligating brackets for faster and more comfortable movement in less treatment time.

Title: Air Maui
Content:
The Air Maui Experience begins long before you board a helicopter. When you first step into our terminal at Kahului Heliport, you know you’re among friends. Our welcoming and professional staff greet every passenger and personally assist with check-in. As you flight is prepared, relax in our comfortable terminal or browse through our retail shop, which features genuine Air Maui clothing and souvenirs.

Book An Air Maui Helicopter Tour Today!

Beach Proposal Flight

Trying to think of a unique, romantic way to propose to the love of your life? How about a private helicopter flight?

30 Min.

DETAILS

Charter Flight

With a Custom Charter, we can provide a range of options including custom tours for couples or family groups, basic point-to-point transportation, remote landing sites, catering, and ground transportation.

Book by the Hour

DETAILS

Complete Island

Imagine taking in all the sights of the East Maui, then heading deep into the isolated interior of the West Maui Mountains. There is no other place on Earth like it.

60 Min.

DETAILS

Doors-Off West Maui & Molokai

Maui’s only doors-off helicopter tour includes the West Maui Mountains then crosses the Pailolo Channel to explore the magnificent sea cliffs and waterfalls of Molokai’s rugged north shore.

30 Min.

10 Yrs & Older

DETAILS

Hana & Haleakala

This flight takes you to the most requested sights in East Maui: Haleakala Crater, lush tropical rainforest of Hana, deep valleys, and spectacular waterfalls. The best 45 minutes you can spend on Maui!

45 Min.

DETAILS

Hana & Haleakala With Cliffside Landing

Fly over Haleakala and then land at our private landing location and take in the views over Maui and the ocean below. Then, fly over Hana’s rain forests, remote valleys and waterfalls on your return flight.

75 Min.

DETAILS

West Maui & Molokai

If you’re looking for waterfalls and more waterfalls, the combination of West Maui and Molokai’s north shore is the ticket. 

60 Min.

DETAILS

West Maui & Molokai Special

All the highlights of West Maui and Molokai condensed into a 45-minute tour. The best for less!

45 Min.

DETAILS

Hana & Haleakala With Cliffside Landing

Fly over the ridges of West Maui and across the Pailolo channel to Molokai to explore the tallest sea cliffs, rainforest and waterfalls. Then land at Air Maui’s private oceanfront landing location on the North shore of Maui to take in the views.

75 Min.

DETAILS

Title: Air Kauai Helicopters
Content:
The Air Kauai Experience begins long before you board a helicopter. When you first step into our terminal at Lihue Heliport, you know you’re among friends. Our welcoming and professional staff greet every passenger and personally assist with check-in. As you flight is prepared, we can answer any questions you may have while you relax in our comfortable terminal.

At Air Kauai, the proof is in our record: over 25 years of perfect safety. That's not luck - it's the combined commitment of professional pilots and top-notch aircraft maintenance personnel.

Book An Air Kauai Helicopters Tour

Amazing Kauai Helicopter Tour

On this flight you will be able to explore Hanapepe Valley and Manawaiopuna Falls (from Jurassic Park). As well as hover above the famus Waimea Canyon and see the rugged sea cliffs on the Na Pali Coast.

45-50 Min.

DETAILS

Doors-Off Kauai Helicopter Tour

Kauai’s only doors-off helicopter tour with the same sights as our other tours but with the added excitement and unimpeded views that come with riding a helicopter with its doors off!

45 Min.

10 Yrs & Older

DETAILS

Epic Kauai Helicopter Tour

Our longer flight spends extra time exploring the most amazing and commonly requested sights of Kauai all from an aerial view.

55-60 Min.

DETAILS

Bobs Tour

This is a really cool tour.

2 hrs.

5 Yrs. & Older

DETAILS

Title: Hawaii Nautical - Waianae, Oahu
Content:
Hawaii Nautical is one of Hawaii's largest ocean-activity providers, with a fleet of vessels islandwide serving many harbors across Oahu and the Big Island. We believe in delivering service, safety, and the spirit of Aloha.

We respect the ocean and the ecosystem, and follow strict guidelines so that all marine mammals and wildlife are protected. And we honor the host-culture and support the local communities in which we operate.

A portion of proceeds from your trip with Hawaii Nautical helps many worthy causes, including: 

HAWAII NAUTICAL MARINE LIFE FOUNDATION

We want the natural environment you enjoy today to be here tomorrow, and for every tomorrow after.

That’s why we are Hawaii’s first Dolphin Smart-recognized operator. NOAA’s Dolphin Smart educates guests about dolphin conservation and harassment and advises not to seek activities that pursue close interactions like swimming with dolphins in Hawaii in the wild.

We also follow the guidelines of the Coral Reef Alliance, to establish lasting change and promote coral reef health around the world. That includes sustainable practices — such as no fish-feeding. Coral conservation aims to save these valuable ecosystems, unite communities and preserve cultural identity. 

E ALA — “THE AWAKENING”

This authentic Hawaiian voyaging canoe is making its return to Waianae Harbor as a floating classroom to promote Hawaiian culture for area students and residents. 

Students learn Hawaiian wayfinding, an ancient Polynesian method of navigation where a captain reads the positions and paths of stars, the sun, clouds, winds, ocean swells and the flights of land-based birds, to find his or her way across the ocean. E Ala was built inspired by the historic voyages of the Hokule’a. E Ala also teaches canoe maintenance and sailing.

E Ala is a project of the Wai’anae Hawaiian Civic Club, which sponsors Native Hawaiian projects and provides student grants. Visit www.waianaehcc.org to learn more.

ALL YOU NEED TO ENJOY THE WATER

Hawaii Nautical also sells top-of-the-line snorkel gear, as well as everything you need to make your day at the beach or pool the best each and every time. Our affiliate Marina Pool, Spa & Patio carries everything from floats, toys, inflatables & snorkel gear, to pool and spa supplies, outdoor furnishings and grills. Whether you're taking care of your home pool & patio, or maintaining a large aquatic complex at a park, resort or school, Marina can supply the best prices and personal service. Check out the latest items here (shipping within the contiguous U.S. or freight to Hawaii additional).

Book A Hawaii Nautical Tour Today!

West Dolphin Snorkel Sail

Set sail on West Oahu coast’s newest sailing catamaran to view dolphins, turtles and other marine life including whales in-season (December through March). Snorkel at a calm & vibrant anchorage.

2 Hrs.

West Oahu Sunset Cruise

Nothing beats a Hawaiian sunset at sea. Enjoy a scenic cruise of the West Oahu coast, catching the moment the sun slips below the horizon – you may even see the green flash. Individualized light bento included.

2 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="hawaiinautical" items="213716" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Disney Catamaran

Join an exclusive group of Aulani Guests for this 3-hour ocean adventure aboard the 65-foot Gold Coast Catamaran "Ko Nau Lani" and cruise out along the shoreline of Oahu’s sun-kissed leeward coast.

3 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="hawaiinautical" items="213718" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

West Oahu Ocean Playground

Cruise & snorkel. Bring your snorkel and mask, or sanitized re-usable sets are available as a backup. Fins and snorkel vests are provided and in-water assistance from expert crew are included.

2 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="hawaiinautical" items="214607" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Morning Wildlife Watch and Cruise

Sightsee along the stunning Waianae coastline and enjoy a fast and fun powerboat ride. Cruises includes soda, juice and water.

2 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="hawaiinautical" items="310500" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

West Oahu Whale Watch

Every December through March, thousands of Humpback whales migrate to the warm waters of Hawaii. Come along see catch these beautiful mammals at their best on our exciting eco-friendly whale watching excursions.

2 Hrs.

Title: Hawaii Nautical - Kawaihae Harbor
Content:
Hawaii Nautical is one of Hawaii's largest ocean-activity providers, with a fleet of vessels islandwide serving many harbors across Oahu and the Big Island. We believe in delivering service, safety, and the spirit of Aloha.

We respect the ocean and the ecosystem, and follow strict guidelines so that all marine mammals and wildlife are protected. And we honor the host-culture and support the local communities in which we operate.

A portion of proceeds from your trip with Hawaii Nautical helps many worthy causes, including: 

HAWAII NAUTICAL MARINE LIFE FOUNDATION

We want the natural environment you enjoy today to be here tomorrow, and for every tomorrow after.

That’s why we are Hawaii’s first Dolphin Smart-recognized operator. NOAA’s Dolphin Smart educates guests about dolphin conservation and harassment and advises not to seek activities that pursue close interactions like swimming with dolphins in Hawaii in the wild.

We also follow the guidelines of the Coral Reef Alliance, to establish lasting change and promote coral reef health around the world. That includes sustainable practices — such as no fish-feeding. Coral conservation aims to save these valuable ecosystems, unite communities and preserve cultural identity. 

E ALA — “THE AWAKENING”

This authentic Hawaiian voyaging canoe is making its return to Waianae Harbor as a floating classroom to promote Hawaiian culture for area students and residents. 

Students learn Hawaiian wayfinding, an ancient Polynesian method of navigation where a captain reads the positions and paths of stars, the sun, clouds, winds, ocean swells and the flights of land-based birds, to find his or her way across the ocean. E Ala was built inspired by the historic voyages of the Hokule’a. E Ala also teaches canoe maintenance and sailing.

E Ala is a project of the Wai’anae Hawaiian Civic Club, which sponsors Native Hawaiian projects and provides student grants. Visit www.waianaehcc.org to learn more.

ALL YOU NEED TO ENJOY THE WATER

Hawaii Nautical also sells top-of-the-line snorkel gear, as well as everything you need to make your day at the beach or pool the best each and every time. Our affiliate Marina Pool, Spa & Patio carries everything from floats, toys, inflatables & snorkel gear, to pool and spa supplies, outdoor furnishings and grills. Whether you're taking care of your home pool & patio, or maintaining a large aquatic complex at a park, resort or school, Marina can supply the best prices and personal service. Check out the latest items here (shipping within the contiguous U.S. or freight to Hawaii additional).

Book A Hawaii Nautical Tour Today!

Late Afternoon Whales Guaranteed

Catch these beautiful mammals at their best on our exciting eco-friendly whale watching excursions. Dolphins are likely to be seen, too.

1.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Mid-Day Whales Guaranteed

Every December through April, thousands of Humpback whales migrate to the warm waters of Hawaii. Come along see these beautiful mammals.

1.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Wildlife Guaranteed Catamaran Snorkel Lunch

Hop aboard this terrific snorkel power catamaran, with ample seating and shade. Enjoy the coastal sights and a refreshing swim and snorkel.

3 Hrs.

DETAILS

Title: Huaka'i Luau
Content:
A Huakai Luau is one of the best ways to celebrate a trip to the Hawaiian Islands. It’s a Hawaiian feast that features lively music and cultural performances from Hawaii and the greater Polynesia.

The concept of the luau still enjoys celebration two centuries later. It is important to remember that, despite its Hawaiian roots and the luau name, not all entertainment or food at a luau is Hawaiian. The multi-cultural society of Hawaii is reflected in a contemporary luau. The food served at a family luau can be as varied as the branches of the family tree. A visitor luau usually features dances and music from other Polynesian culture.

A sumptuous buffet dinner will be served to complement the show concept.

Our award-winning performers will amaze and entertain you with a spectacular display of songs and dances from Hawaii and Polynesia at the Huaka’i Luau – Journey Through Polynesia.

Enjoy the rich cultural heritage found on the pacific islands. The spectacular Polynesian show is presented at the ocean’s edge under the stars, palm trees and stars. Feel the magic and splendor of ancient Hawaii. Experience the spirit of Aloha and a Backyard-style Hawaiian Luau. Discover why Huaka’i Luau, a special experience celebrating the Oceans of Aloha is so unique.

Book A Huaka'i Luau Today!

Journey Through Polynesia - General Admission

Huaka’i Luau invites you to experience Hawaiian and Polynesian culture through music, dance, storytelling, and great food!

2 Hrs.

Title: Kauai Backcountry Adventures
Content:
Hop on one of our four-wheel-drive vehicles and traverse the former Lihue Plantation lands as we ride deep into Kauai’s pristine emerald green interior, where your tubing adventure begins! Enjoy breathtaking vistas while your guide shares information about our island. When you arrive at our launch site, grab a tube, don a headlamp, and jump in the gently flowing waters. 

Witness Kauai’s spectacular, historic engineering feats as you float down the open canals and through several amazing tunnels and flumes engineered and hand-dug circa 1870. Enjoy the wonder and magic of each tunnel illuminated by your headlamp. At the end of your adventure, you are guided to an enchanted picnic area nearby for a delicious lunch and a cool dip in a natural swimming hole. There’s no better way to experience the Kauai mountains!

THE MOUNTAIN TUBING ADVENTURE IS A UNIQUE AND MEMORABLE EXPERIENCE FOR THE ENTIRE FAMILY!

This tubing adventure is perfect for people ages 5 and over and in generally good physical condition. The gently flowing waters, beautiful scenery, flumes, and tunnels create a relaxing, fun, and fascinating experience. And when we say we are unique, we mean it! This is the only tubing activity of this type on Kauai, and we are the only eco-tour company with access to these 17,000 acres of former plantation lands.

The historic Lihue Plantation ditch and tunnel system that once irrigated vast sugar crops had been unused since sugar was taken out of production in 2000. In January 2003, Kaua’i Backcountry opened a section for exclusive tubing tours. This water system runs through some of the most beautiful and remote lands on the island. It includes spectacular views of the ocean, coastline, mountains, and valleys. The waters that originate near the top of Mount Waialeale, one of the wettest spots in the world, are channeled through ditches and tunnels hand-dug by plantation workers over a century ago!

If you want to get off the beaten track, don’t miss this exclusive tubing tour. From start to finish, we take you on an amazing, fun-filled journey that you’re not likely to forget. Our customers tell us time and time again that our tours were the highlight of their vacation and often return for more of our tropical adventures.

FLY ABOVE THE KAUAI RAINFOREST, BACKCOUNTRY ZIPLINE TOUR!

Imagine the thrill of soaring like a bird over a pristine rainforest… With Kaua’i Backcountry Adventures, you can “get high” on this exhilarating experience! Fly across seven ziplines that descend a stunning mountainside. Feel the rush as you glide over lush tropical forests and deep valleys below. With exclusive access to over 17,000 acres of former plantation lands, we offer you a truly unique zipline experience.

Your adventure begins with a fun, informative, scenic ride in our four-wheel-drive vehicle. Along the way, your certified guide shares interesting information on island history, culture, flora, and fauna. When you arrive at the first zipline, you receive a thorough briefing, preparing you to soar over tropical forests, streams, and jungles rich with magnificent scenery! Zoom down the mountainside, sailing along on a series of seven ziplines, as you make your way to the valley floor below.

End your zip with snacks in a bamboo grove and a refreshing swim. Relax, bask in the sun, or just soak in our natural swimming pool. Take one last dip in the water before heading back to home base! This is truly an incredible journey that leaves you with vacation memories to last a lifetime.

Book Your Kauai Backcountry Adventure Today!

Enjoy breathtaking vistas while your guide shares information about our island.

Title: Maui Adventure Cruises
Content:
Lanai Dolphin Adventure

Start your Lanai Snorkeling Trip with Kona coffee, passion orange juice and ice water during check-in at Slip #11 in Lahaina Harbor. Souvenir photographs are taken by a professional photographer when you board our Explorer Super Raft. After leaving Lahaina Harbor, we head across the Au’au channel to the island of Lanai for snorkeling. Two snorkel sites are selected by the captain to provide the clearest and calmest ocean conditions. Snorkel gear, instructions and safety tips are provided by our experienced captain and crew. Spinner and Bottlenose Dolphins are often encountered off the island of Lanai. We see lots of tropical reef fish, green sea turtles and occasional manta rays at the snorkel sites.

Coastline Snorkel & Raft Adventure

Cruise the West Maui Coastline to a fabulous snorkel site where you swim & snorkel for over one hour with tropical fish over a colorful coral reef and maybe even see green sea turtles, spotted eagle rays, and moray eels. In transit, you may encounter Spinner & Bottlenose Dolphins. We supply quality snorkel equipment and swim noodles and serve tropical snacks and juices, sodas, and bottled water throughout the trip.

Snorkel site options going north include Cliff House, Kapalua Bay, and Honolua Bay Marine Preserve. Heading south the main destination is Olowalu Reef and then returning to Lahaina Town and possibly Mala Sunken Wharf is known for its turtle town. Our experienced captain selects the best site depending on that day’s sea and wind conditions (Captain’s Choice).

The 50-ft “Explorer Super Raft” (the largest in Hawaii) is fast and comfortable with the “Cadillac Ride” of a stable deep V-hull craft and has plenty of padded seats and a large bimini top for lots of shade. Our custom-designed vessel even has an onboard marine head/restroom, large swim step, two wide loading ladders, and a freshwater rinse shower.

Whale Watch Adventure

Enjoy ocean-level whale watching on our Explorer Super Rafts.

Our 50 ft. Explorer Super Rafts with the CADILLAC RIDE are the largest in the state of Hawaii (USCG certified to carry 42 passengers but we limit our trips to 36 passengers for comfort). Explorer Super Rafts are fast, fun & comfortable vessels allowing more time to whale watch and less time traveling to and from our leviathan friends.

During Whale Season (December – April) we operate two hour guaranteed sighting Whale Watch Adventures. Our Explorer Super Rafts depart Lahaina Harbor, Front Row Slip 11 up to 3 times per day.

Book Your Maui Adventure Cruise Today!

Lanai Dolphin Adventure

Spinner and Bottlenose Dolphins are often encountered off the island of Lanai.

5 Yrs. & Older

Title: Mauna Loa Helicopter Tours - Kauai
Content:
Our exclusive and affordable private helicopter tours of the Garden Isle treat you to an unbeatable adventure. Prepare to be mesmerized by unequaled views and photo opportunities of Kauai’s most stunning scenery. Our Kauai helicopter tours take you to Waimea Canyon, Mt. Waialeale, the Na Pali Coast, and breathtaking cascades of waterfalls. We are conveniently located to service helicopter tours to the Princeville, Lihue, and Waimea areas. Currently all tours are flown with the doors off for your safety. 

About Mauna Loa Helicopter Tours

Mauna Loa Helicopters has been offering private sightseeing tours over Kauai since 2006, and we recently expanded to offer tour operations from our island bases on Oahu and the Big Island. Along with our impeccable safety record, we take pride in making each tour a spectacular, personalized experience. We exclusively use the incredibly reliable and energy-efficient Robinson helicopters.

Our Pilots

Mauna Loa Helicopters started out as a flight training school and has been training professional helicopter pilots for 22 years. As a result, all of our pilots are highly trained and have years of experience flying over Hawaii’s varied terrain and navigating its uniquely diverse weather conditions. They are also Certified Flight Instructors, especially skilled and current in safety operations. Because of this blend of skills, they are a great source of information about not only local landmarks, but also the operation of helicopters and the unique aspects of life in Hawai’i. During your flight, each pilot provides a personal narration accompanied by an individually selected soundtrack.

Book A Mauna Loa Helicopter Tour Today!

Kauai Pro Photography Helicopter Flight

Whether you’re an amateur photographer or a pro, you’re sure to bring home stunning shots of the island.

1 Hrs.

7 Yrs. & Older

DETAILS

The Kauai Helicopter Experience

Explore the rugged splendor of the Na Pali Coast, the deep colorful gorges of Waimea Canyon, and magnificent Manawaiopuna (“Jurassic”) Falls.

1 Hrs.

7 Yrs. & Older

DETAILS

Title: Mauna Loa Helicopter Tours - Oahu
Content:
Oahu has often been described as the heartbeat of Hawai’i: a magical place where Hawaiian culture blends with the East and the West. Enjoy a private charter of Honolulu, Waikiki and the fabled North Shore. You’re sure to be mesmerized by Hawaii’s most beautiful beaches and landscapes on our private charter. Choose your Oahu helicopter ride below and discover Honolulu, Waikiki, and more from new heights!

About Mauna Loa Helicopter Tours

Mauna Loa Helicopters has been offering private sightseeing tours over Kauai since 2006, and we recently expanded to offer tour operations from our island bases on Oahu and the Big Island. Along with our impeccable safety record, we take pride in making each tour a spectacular, personalized experience. We exclusively use the incredibly reliable and energy-efficient Robinson helicopters.

Our Pilots

Mauna Loa Helicopters started out as a flight training school and has been training professional helicopter pilots for 22 years. As a result, all of our pilots are highly trained and have years of experience flying over Hawaii’s varied terrain and navigating its uniquely diverse weather conditions. They are also Certified Flight Instructors, especially skilled and current in safety operations. Because of this blend of skills, they are a great source of information about not only local landmarks, but also the operation of helicopters and the unique aspects of life in Hawai’i. During your flight, each pilot provides a personal narration accompanied by an individually selected soundtrack.

Book A Mauna Loa Helicopter Tour Today!

Oahu Pro Photography Flight

Mauna Loa Helicopter Tours presents the ultimate photo flight for the professional (and seriously good amateur) photographers visiting Oahu.

Title: Voyagers of the Pacific Luau
Content:
An Interactive Hawaii Luau Show On The Shores Of Kailua Bay
Beating drums beckon you to the ocean’s edge. Voyagers of the Pacific oceanfront luau is a sensory feast of Polynesian rituals that tell the story of an ancient culture. Our sumptuous all-you-care-to-eat dinner with a full bar is a bounty to feast. Then, as drumbeats build, a dramatic song and dance show unfold on stage, culminating in the Samoan fire knife dance finale – the most dangerous dance in all of Polynesia.

Includes:

  • Prime Oceanfront seating overlooking Kailua Bay
  • Aloha shell lei welcome
  • Photo opportunities
  • Arts & Craft Demonstrations
  • Learn to hula with a group lesson
  • Delicious all-you-care-to-eat Hawaiian Luau buffet with traditional island fare and local specialties
  • Complimentary Mai Tais, standard cocktails, beer, wine, and non-alcoholic offerings
  • Imu ceremony to unearth the Kalua Pua’a (roast pig) from the in-ground oven*
  • Dynamic and Lyrical Polynesian Revue with Dance, Song, and Live Music!
  • Samoan Fire Knife Dance Finale (Siva Afi)!

Book A Voyagers of the Pacific Luau!

Voyagers of the Pacific Luau at the Royal Kona Resort

Voyagers of the Pacific oceanfront luau is a sensory feast of Polynesian rituals that tell the story of an ancient culture.

3.25 Hrs.

DETAILS

Title: Safari Helicopters - Big Island
Content:
One of Hawai‘i's longest-running helicopter tour companies, Safari Helicopters, offers customers 30 years of experience, knowledge and seasoned customer service.

Take a flight to the World’s most active volcano. The Big Island has been erupting almost continuously since 1983, pouring red-hot molten earth into the cool waters of the Pacific Ocean.

All Hawaiian volcanoes are produced by a plume of lava known as the Hawaiian magmatic hot spot. This plume of lava rises up from deep within Earth’s mantle and burns through the seafloor crust to form volcanic mountains that eventually rise above the surface of the sea to form Hawaiian Islands.

The Hawaiian Islands are actually just the summits of these massive volcanoes that grew up from the ocean floor as much as 18,000 feet below the water’s surface.

The Big Island is the youngest Hawaiian Island, less than a half a million years old, and its two major volcanoes are Mauna Loa (which includes Kilauea Volcano) and Mauna Kea. These massive volcanoes are a sight to behold from the vantage point of a helicopter (when clouds do not interfere). Mauna Kea rises to 13,796 feet above sea level. Mauna Kea is considered the tallest mountain on Earth if measured from base to summit, towering up more than 6 miles from the ocean bottom.

The volcanic activity of the Hawaiian hot spot continues today on the Big Island at Kiluaea Volcano, and the East Rift Zone. Safari Helicopters tours survey the diverse array of volcanic formations throughout the whole area where this activity has recently occurred and also where it is happening right now!

The aptly named Chain of Craters Road descends 3,700 feet from the summit of Kilauea Volcano to the sea, and has repeatedly been blocked by lava flows with more than 9 miles of the road covered since 1986. The Pu’u O’O Vent flows off and on into the ocean (fluctuating between Chain of Crater Rd and Kalapan Black Sands Beach) and at times sends up plumes of volcanic gas and smoke. From a helicopter this is a most impressive sight to behold.

There are four main districts in the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park; However we mainly tour the East Rift Zone, Which is sub-categorized into 3 different zones:  The Upper East Rift Zone, the Middle East Rift Zone, and the Lower East Rift Zone.  Typically we tour along the coastline to the Lower East Rift Zone where the most recent eruption event happened in Leilani Estates, to show the devastation and new black-sand beach.  Next, we head upslope to the Middle East Rift Zone to explore the Pu’u O’o Vent.  Finally, weather permitting, we move to the Upper East Rift Zone along several craters including Napau and Mauna Ulu to Halemaumau Crater at the summit of the world famous Kilauea Volcano.

Expect to be absolutely amazed at the incredible sights you will see from a Hawaii volcano helicopter tour. There are so many unique land formations and visible volcano history before your eyes that it is difficult to encapsulate it all in words.

Book A Safari Helicopters Tour Today!

Volcanoes National Park & Waterfalls Safari - Hilo

Let Safari fly you directly to Volcano National Park on the Big Island. Your adventure takes you through the story of Earth’s creation.

55 Min.

DETAILS

Title: Toa Luau
Content:
Held at beautiful Waimea Valley on Oahu’s North Shore, Toa Luau invites you to an evening of celebrating Hawaiian culture. Watch a variety of cultural demonstrations, savor a delicious luau buffet dinner and enjoy a spectacular Polynesian show. 

What makes this Hawaiian luau unique is that it includes same-day admission to Waimea Valley, home to a botanical garden with beautiful nature trails, a waterfall and historical sites. If you would like to take advantage of the included admission to Waimea Valley to walk through the botanical garden and visit Waimea Falls, please arrive earlier in the day before the luau festivities.

Book A Toa Luau Today!

Title: Active Oahu Tours
Content:
Michael Gulden started Active Oahu in 2013 as a way to share some of the best scenery and adventures on Oahu in a more convenient and family friendly way. Active Oahu escapes the mainstream and helps get you off the beaten path and out on an adventure. We make the tours authentic and more personalized as well as cater to easy and flexible delivery and pickup of beach gear and equipment.

If you take our tours, you’ll get a “local-style” tour experience with authentic and friendly guides: Oahu Kayak Tours and Activities. In order to keep things fresh, the guides are less scripted and more themselves. We also keep our tour groups small and private. We try not to combine groups so you can have a more exclusive experience and really immerse yourself in the beauty of Oahu.

We help make your Oahu adventures a breeze, so in order to help those adventurous souls who don’t want/need a guide, we deliver rental equipment. Less wait and more time for fun. Our most popular item is our kayak rentals, but we also rent out other beach equipment: Oahu Beach Gear Rentals. This is especially nice for those staying at vacation rentals who are on a perfect beach and want to save time and get convenient delivery to their doorstep. We make the deliveries straight to your address and with multiple day rentals, you can enjoy the convenience of having beach equipment longer. We also deliver to beaches, but plan in advance, we get booked pretty quick.

Book An Active Oahu Kayaking Tour Today!

Rainforest River Kayak Self-Guided Tour

This is the Best Kayaking Experience on Oahu. This self-guided Oahu kayak tour takes you up a calm river into the valley then out into the bay for a great view of the coast.

3 Hrs.

3 Yrs. & Older

DETAILS

Chinaman's Hat Self-Guided Kayak Tour

Experience ocean kayaking to Mokolii on our Chinaman’s Hat Self-Guided Kayak Tour. We provide everything you need to have a great and safe time out on the water.

3 Hrs.

3 Yrs. & Older

DETAILS

Title: All Hawaii Cruises
Content:
Captain Bob’s Picnic Sail begins with our free transportation from Waikiki through the popular Likelike or Pali Highway to the windward side of Oahu.

Aboard one of our catamarans, our crew will provide you with safety instructions, and personal fitting of snorkeling equipment. Along the way to our first stop, the sandbar, you will enjoy the beautiful view, including places like Gilligan’s Island and Chinaman’s Hat, also known as Mokoli’i.

At the first stop, the sandbar, the crew will set up the water volleyball net to begin a friendly and fun game. Water volleyball can be fun no matter how experienced a volleyball player you are. If you are looking for a quiet relaxing day, you can swim in the refreshingly cool water or take a stroll on the sandbar in the midst of the bay. The succulent aroma of BBQ will alert you that lunch is being prepared. The crew will let you know when your food is ready.

Lunch includes hamburgers, baked beans, salad, chips, and fruits. We are prepared for our vegetarian friends as well. Just let our crew know when you make your reservation. The crew will be more than happy to cook up a veggie-burger for you.

After lunch, the vessels will set sail to our second stop, the coral reef. At the coral reef, you can snorkel among the many colorful tropical fishes. Among them, you will see the ever so rare green sea turtles, occasionally dolphins, our state fish, the Humuhumunukunukuapua’a. Certainly, you will see the various types of coral. We do ask, however, that you do not walk on it, despite its firm appearance, the coral is very fragile.

When you return on board, our crew will provide you with a fresh water rinse, so you will have a comfortable return trip.

Includes:

  • Snorkeling – Sanitized equipment
  • Water sports including Hawaiian Style Water Volleyball, sunning, and swimming.
  • See landmarks such as Gilligan’s Island and Chinaman’s Hat.
  • Lunch is served on board at the Sandbar and includes:
    • Sumptuous barbecue hamburger with all the trimmings.
    • Baked Beans, Fruit Cocktail and Chips
  • Assorted beverages are served throughout the sail.
    • Complimentary Sodas, Coffee, Tea or Hot Chocolate
    • Regular and Light Beer and Wine – $5.00 per drink

Book An All Hawaii Cruises Snorkel Tour Today!

Captain Bob's Picnic Sail - Kaneohe Bay

During this 4 hour cruise you will enjoy the popular sandbar and snorkeling over a coral reef teaming with aquatic life.

4 Hrs.

DETAILS

Title: And You Creations
Content:
At And You Creations, we believe that experiences in Hawaii’s distinctive nature can have a profound impact on one’s life.

From dolphin watching to hiking the Manoa Falls Trail to embarking on an odyssey of the tastes, sights, history of Oahu, we strive to leave our guests more fulfilled than they were before they visited the island.

Our aim is to share the message of peace and unity with other people and the environment, as Hawaiian culture teaches us to do.

Our tour experiences are designed to share the best Hawaii has to offer. 

From watching dolphins, to hiking the Manoa Falls Trail, to embarking on an odyssey of the tastes, sights, history of Oahu, we strive to ensure you leave us feeling more fulfilled than when you started.

Hawaii is an amazing place, and we feel honored and humbled to be able to share it with you.

Book An And You Creations Boat Tour Today!

Dolphins and You

If you haven’t spent time watching dolphins in their natural habitat in Hawaii, then you’re missing out on a truly life-changing experience.

3 Hrs.

2 Yrs. & Older

DETAILS

Island and You

Island and You is a full-day circle-island bus tour, packed with some of Oahu’s best sights and plenty of delicious Hawaiian food! 

9 Hrs.

2 Yrs. & Older

DETAILS

Ocean and You

Take in the glow of Diamond head at golden hour and the magic of the Honolulu city lights from an all-new luxury powerboat! Ocean and You is the ultimate Waikiki booze cruise. 

2 Hrs.

21 Yrs. & Older

Title: Banzai Divers Hawaii - Waikiki
Content:
Banzai Divers Hawaii is a small diving company that focuses on small, personable groups where divers are treated like old friends. Our goal is to share our love for Hawaiian diving and creating unforgettable memories for you.

Oahu is part of the most isolated chain of islands in the world! This means that as much as 30 percent of the marine life you’ll see on our reefs cannot be found anywhere else on earth! Aside from this, our reefs are known for their variety of colorful hard corals such as lobe, cauliflower, antler, brain, and mushroom. Don’t miss the small stuff! While everyone can appreciate our massive turtles and other large pelagic animals, we stress the importance of the little guys. Our guides are known around the island for finding things other miss such as rare and colorful nudibranchs (sea slugs), frogfish, fluorescent shrimp, camouflage octopus, and more!

Oahu is known for its variety of wreck dives. From massive fishing trollers, to minesweepers, or WWII planes, we’ve got it all. These underwater structures also provide host to a plethora of amazing marine life! Ancient green sea turtles come to rest on the decks, colossal moray eels peek out from vents, while sharks and rays swim around the bottoms to create a truly remarkable dive.

Book A Banzai Divers Hawaii Scuba Tour Today!

2 Tank Shallow Reef Boat Dives - Waikiki

Title: Banzai Divers Hawaii - North Shore
Content:
Banzai Divers Hawaii is a small diving company that focuses on small, personable groups where divers are treated like old friends. Our goal is to share our love for Hawaiian diving and creating unforgettable memories for you.

No-Experience Scuba Dive

Whether this is your first time experiencing SCUBA, you’re an uncertified diver, or it’s just been a while, this is the perfect choice for you!

Our experienced, professionally certified PADI instructors will guide you through your first breaths underwater, or reintroduce you to your passion. With a maximum depth of 40 feet (12 meters) and a very small ratio of divers per instructor, you will be personally supervised under the safest conditions. Don’t worry, you’ll still get to see all the amazing marine life our island has to offer.

Lava Tube Scuba Dive

Beautiful and unique dives in world renown Pupukea Marine Life Preserve, known locally as “Sharks Cove” Here we encounter amazing underwater topography such as lava tubes and tunnels, trenches, arches and an abundance of protected marine life such as turtles, monk seals, octopi, rays, and a plethora of native fish. With max depths of around 45ft, this site is perfect for all experience levels!

WHAT IS A LAVA TUBE?

A lava tube is a lava cave that can form when lava, or pele in Hawaiian, flows beneath the surface of hardened rock. As the underground flow slows and cools, tunnels can form as it creates a crust around itself. Underwater, this creates a truly spectacular seascape few people see.

Book A Banzai Divers Hawaii Scuba Dive Today!

Beautiful and unique dives in world renown Pupukea Marine Life Preserve, known locally as “Sharks Cove” Here we encounter amazing underwater topography such as lava tubes and tunnels, trenches, and arches.

Title: Dolphin Star - Waianae
Content:
Cruise in comfort aboard the 149-passenger Dolphin Star, Oahu’s largest dolphin vessel. Watch from our multi-level, open-air viewing decks as wild dolphins jump, play, and socialize in their family pods. Learn about Hawaii’s beautiful marine animals from our onboard certified Naturalists. For children, a fun souvenir activity book is included!

Journey to a dolphin paradise along Waianae Coast on Oahu’s largest dolphin vessel! Enjoy the comfort and spaciousness of the panoramic multi-level decks for clear, picturesque views. Expert narration by certified Naturalists and Captain will create an unforgettable dolphin cruise experience. Kids will also enjoy a new educational and interactive keiki (child) program, plus Dolphin Guarantee year-round! All aboard the Dolphin Star, an eco-friendly catamaran custom built in 2007.

Vessel Info: Eco-friendly, 149-passenger, 2-deck Dolphin Star catamaran was custom built for wild dolphin watching and snorkeling in paradise! The 65’ vessel minimizes emissions with EPA compliant main engines, hybrid power generator, GPS, autopilot, radar and operates at the cruising speed shown by recent NOAA studies to be safe for marine mammals. It also has a 360° observation deck, wrap-around deck, dining area, bar, restrooms, and BBQ facility.

Route: Dolphin Star cruises from Waianae Boat Harbor toward Kaena Point or Ko Olina, depending on the best possible route for wild dolphin watching and location for snorkeling. The Captain may alter the route or cancel the cruise depending on weather conditions.

Dolphin Guarantee: Receive a free return “Dolphin Check” until a dolphin is sighted (meal and transportation optional).

Dolphin Star Pledge: We comply with all government guidelines for the protection of marine mammals since our debut of the Wild Dolphin Watch cruise in 2007.

Book A Dolphin Star Dolphin Watching Boat Tour Today!

Wild Dolphin Watch

Watch from our multi-level, open-air viewing decks as wild dolphins jump, play, and socialize in their family pods. 

2 Hrs.

DETAILS

Wild Dolphin Watch & BBQ

Go on a once-in-a-lifetime adventure to see wild dolphins at play along Oahu’s west side aboard the eco-friendly 149-passenger Dolphin Star, Oahu’s largest dolphin vessel.

2 - 3 Hrs.

DETAILS

Title: Hawaii Ocean Adventure Tours
Content:
See Haleiwa Like Never Before

When you want to see the best of Hawaii, Hawaii Ocean Adventure Tours can help you live out your greatest dreams! We're dedicated to planning the trip of a lifetime for each and every guest, offering personalized experiences, private tours, and so much more. Whether you're a native passionate about wildlife or a visitor to our fair island, there's nothing our team can't offer!

History

Hawaii ocean adventure tours was established in 2016 by Captain Ryan Bruner. Captain Ryan saw a need for something no other boat tour company was offering,a fully customizable private charter company based out of Haleiwa harbor. With his extensive knowledge of the North Shore waters having over a decade of time at the helm on these fabled waters, he is able to offer a wide variety of adventures such as deep-sea fishing, sunset cruises, shark viewing and snorkeling tours, as well as whale watching and turtle tours.

Pelagic Shark Dive

This pelagic shark dive tour offers exclusively private shark dives from 2 to 6 guests. The tour consists of an hour and a half excursion in which you get to spend about 20 minutes in the ocean with these beautiful and majestic creatures. While the tour is guaranteed to be exhilarating, you will also learn about the importance of sharks to our ecosystem. Your guide will be the first one in the water and the last one out after all the guests are safely back on the boat. We also offer a reduced price for ride-along passengers.

Recommendations:

  • Towel, sunblock, camera, smiles (mask and snorkels are provided)
  • If you are prone to motion sickness then take Dramamine the night before your tour and then again the morning of. 
  • You can bring food and drink, or you can call ahead and lunch will be provided onboard for a small additional cost.

Book A Hawaii Ocean Adventure Tour Today!

Pelagic Shark Dive - Haleiwa

An hour and a half excursion in which you get to spend about 20 minutes in the ocean with these beautiful and majestic creatures

2 Hrs.

DETAILS

Title: Hawaiian Diving Adventures
Content:
Hawaiian Diving Adventures is the premier scuba dive shop in Honolulu, Hawaii. We are the best dive operation on Oahu with top tier instructors and an excellent safety record. We invite you to check out our wide range of dive trips, scuba diver training, and services. If you are looking for a fun, safe, and rewarding scuba experience, look no further than Hawaiian Diving Adventures.

Waikiki Coral Reef Dives

Our daily reef diving starts in the late morning (11:00 am-2:30 pm) and is great for newer divers, or for divers wanting a more casual experience on our shallow reefs. The coral gardens are a quick 10-15 minute boat ride from our harbor. By the time you put on your wetsuit, we are ready to get in the water. We usually see at least one sea turtle on the way out of the harbor!

This trip is for certified divers and first-time, basic divers. We often have groups of all levels on the reef dives, so it is a great way to meet other divers from around the world. Our groups are always small and organized according to experience level. We do not mix certified divers with basic divers unless they are part of the same group and want to dive together.

Hawaii does not have “dive sites” as you find elsewhere. We have amazing, beautiful, and huge reef systems that surround the islands. Here on Oahu, we have several unique reef systems where we regularly dive. These systems are so diverse that we are able to do different dives in the same area. No two dives are ever the same, and our guides deliver a unique experience every time.

Waikiki Deep & Shallow Dive

Tailored for more experienced divers, our deep and shallow dive will take you to the some of the best sites off the coast of Oahu. We usually start with a 100-foot plunge to a shipwreck. Because the wrecks are significantly further from shore, we often see more pelagic fish, turtles, sharks, dolphins, and—if we’re lucky—whales! The second dive is usually a reef around 40-60′ deep depending on where we feel like going.

With an experienced enough group, we’re able to guide you to more adventurous areas of the underwater world. These are fun dives for certified divers, we have the freedom to choose the best sites that match what you want to go see.

Book A Hawaiian Diving Adventures Dive Today!

Coral Reef Dives - Waikiki

Great for newer divers, or for divers wanting a more casual experience on our shallow reefs.

3.5 Hrs.

+10 Yrs.

DETAILS

Deep & Shallow Dives - Waikiki

Tailored for more experienced divers, our deep and shallow dive will take you to the some of the best sites off the coast of Oahu.

3.25 Hrs.

+10 Yrs.

DETAILS

Title: Indigo Ocean Hawaii
Content:
The theme of INDIGO OCEAN HAWAII is ‘Feel Nature …’ Located in the heart of the Pacific Ocean, Hawaii still has untouched nature. Hawaii is one of the best places in the world where you can get in touch with nature, see and feel the ecosystem of wildlife that is very rare experience in modern society. Set in the great nature of Hawaii, our famous veteran guide will provide you a heartwarming and healing experience with dolphins and mangroves. We offer comfortable and homey tours to all types and all ages of visitors.

“Save the Earth”

The goal of INDIGO OCEAN HAWAII is to operate sustainable tours to our guests. We would not sell Hawaii’s nature and culture piece by piece. We also aim to provide tours which guests can experience nature of Hawaii while protecting tourist resources. We will make every effort to improve the environmental literacy of all our guests trough our tours. We will contribute to environmental protection and regional tourism promotion by relaying and keeping the attractions that originally Hawaii has.

 “Why Choose Us?”

  • An Impressive Swimming Experience with Wild Dolphins at the West Coast of Oahu
  • Hawaii’s first mangrove kayak tour
  • limited number of participants in a tour
  • Learning about the ecosystem of wild animals (dolphins, sea turtles, etc.)
  • Visiting natural, cultural and historical sites in Hawaii (Waianae Mountains, etc.)
  • Using of Environmental Friendly Product Selection
  • Marine Plastic and Garbage Cleanup Activities

Book An Indigo Ocean Hawaii Tour Today!

AO Hawaii - Swim With Dolphins

In the clear waters of West Oahu, find the wild dolphins pods swimming gracefully in small or large groups.

4 Hrs.

DETAILS

AO Hawaii - Turtle Snorkel

Enjoy a snorkeling experience with the wild Hawaiian sea turtles and tropical island fishes.

2.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

LA Hawaii - Sunset Tour

Get away from the city and venture to the West Coast of Oahu for a relaxing tour on a spacious catamaran to see one of the world’s most iconic and memorable sunsets!

1.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Indigo Ocean Hawaii - Private Cruise

This double-hulled catamaran features a comfortable and stable ride as you relax and take in the breathtaking views of the ocean and the mountains.

3 Hrs.

DETAILS

Title: Maita'i Catamaran
Content:
The amazing Maita'i Catamaran is an ocean adventure, sight-seeing tour and party all in one. This "state of the art", twin hulled, 45 foot catamaran seats 49 passengers comfortably. United States Coast Guard inspected and certified, the Maita'i is ultra-safe and a great time for the entire family.

The front boarding ladder makes getting on easy right from the beach. From there, just kick back, have a Mai Tai, and listen to island rhythms from the CD sound system. And don't worry, there's also a bathroom facility right on board. The best feature though, would have to be the Maita'i crew. They're technically outstanding, and personally entertaining. If you want to laugh your #&! off and have a good time, this is your cat!

Book A Maita'i Catamaran Tour Today!

Afternoon Delite Sail

Sail on our Maita`i Afternoon Delite Sail which departs from Waikiki Beach and enjoy the panoramic views of our island.

1.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Sunset Mai Tai Sail

This is one Mai Tai you’ll remember. You’ll board barefoot from Waikiki Beach, then sail into the sunset sipping a fruity Mai Tai.

1.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Tradewind Sail

Kiss the tour bus goodbye. This is the ride of your life. 90 minutes of pure exhilaration with the wind and waves off Waikiki as your engine.

1.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Title: Makai Adventures
Content:
5-Star Rated Small Group Snorkeling, Light Tackle Bottom Fishing, Seasonal Maui Whale Watching and Private Charter Experiences on Maui.

Makai Adventures provides ocean day trips and tours in Lahaina, Maui. Experience small group or private tours such as Lana'i snorkeling & dolphin tours, bottom fishing, Maui whale watching, and exclusive private charters with the best local guides. 

Unlike boat tour agencies that are big and impersonal, we are your local guide and only take small groups to our favorite places. As a result, our guests enjoy fun, authentic, memorable and unique Maui adventures.

Book A Makai Adventure Today!

Lanai Snorkeling & Dolphin Watch

Take a ride on Kainalu across the ‘Au’Au Channel to the island of Lana’i. Home to Hawaiian Spinner Dolphins, miles of sea cliffs, inaccessible coastlines with sea caves, ancient Hawaiian burial sites.

6 Hrs.

5 Yrs. +

DETAILS

Bottom Fishing

Fun for the whole family! Perfect adventure for the experienced fisherman or for anyone looking to land their first fish.

4 Hrs.

4 Yrs. +

DETAILS

Whale Watching

There is a reason why whale watching is one of the top activities on Maui… It’s Amazing!

2 Hrs.

4 Yrs. +

DETAILS

Title: Manta Adventures
Content:
Newest Boat In the Kona Fleet

It took two years to design and build our brand new boat the Maheli Heli. Six months to design and select a boat builder, Fourteen months to build and two months outfit her with the latest in underwater lighting technology, electronics and instrumentation.

Your Comfort Is Our Priority

There is plenty of space and plenty of seating aboard the Maheli Heli. In addition, while underway on your tour you’ll also find comfort with not having excessive engine sound and the gross smell of exhaust because the engines are super efficient eco diesel and we’ve suppressed the exhaust sound to a quiet hum. These details matter and we considered them all.

YOUR ADVENTURE MATTERS

We realize your on vacation and your on an adventure of a lifetime. We want you to remember this experience with your family and friends forever. For this reason we use the best equipment and technology to give you a great show. We also arrive early at the grounds to get the best spot. Note: this is also one of the reasons we ask you to be on-time. Mahalo

Book A Manta Adventures Tour Today!

Family Fish & Snorkel Private Charter

This private charter includes your own private boat with captain and crew exclusively for you and your family for up to 12 family members for a great price.

4.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Manta Ray Night Snorkel

This once-in-a-lifetime adventure awaits you and yours – Aloha!

3.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Title: Paraglide Maui
Content:
After meeting in our Landing Zone located right across the street from the Ali'i Kula Lavender Farm, we transport you 20 minutes up the side of Mount Haleakala through the Haleakala Watershed Preserve forest to our Ferns launch at 6500' elevation.  From launch, we have spectacular views of Maui's central valley bordered by ocean on either side as well as the islands of Lanai and Molokai in the distance.

Visit their website or call to book and mention that you saw them here on ThisWeekHawaii.com and receive a 10% discount.

Title: Noah's Ark Kauai Tours
Content:
Kaua’i Island is a place of unbelievable striking natural beauty like no other on the planet. From emerald mountains to the the deep blue ocean there are canyons, caves, rivers, beaches, amazing wildlife, and plants and flowers of all kinds. It is also a place rich with history. Ancient Hawaiian temples and the island’s first buildings and towns paint a colorful tapestry of the past. Allow us to take you on a journey that you will never forget. Go to places off the beaten path on a private, customized tour just for you and your group. We are a legitimate Kauai tour service licensed and registered with the State of Hawai'i.

About Noah

Noah has been living between Kaua’i and Japan for the last 18 years. He is a fluent Japanese speaker and very fond of foreign and cultural studies. He also works as a teacher in the public school system and plays with a variety of bands and musicians on the island. He loves surfing, music, Japan and the Japanese language, traveling and tour guiding. He likes to share his deep aloha and respect for Kaua’i with others.

Book A Noah's Ark Tour Today!

East Side & North Shore Tour

This 7-hour tour includes Wailua Falls, Opaekaa Falls, Kauai Hindu Monastery, Kilauea Lighthouse, Hanalei Valley Lookout, Hanalei Bay, Haena Beach Park/Dry Cave, Waikapalae Wet Cave, and Ke’e Beach/Na Pali Coast view.

6 - 7 Hrs.

DETAILS

East Side & North Shore Tour

Highlights of this tour includes the Menehune Fish Pond, the Kauai Coffee Plantation, Waimea Canyon, the Kalalau Valley Lookout, Spouting Horn, Poipu Beach and Wailua Falls.

6 - 7 Hrs.

DETAILS

Title: Oahu Catamarans
Content:
Welcome to Oahu Catamaran charters in Honolulu. Certainly everyone’s favorite charter boat for group and private boat tours in Honolulu. Exclusive catamaran charters in Waikiki operating on the beautiful Kahala Kai catamaran. Spacious and accommodating therefore, always plenty of room for our guests aboard our Waikiki catamaran charter.

Book An Oahu Catamarans Tour Today!

Snorkel Cruise - Waikiki

Come out on the Kahala Kai for the best Waikiki turtle Snorkeling tours. Every day we set sail for the Turtle Canyon reef in Waikiki. We frequently encounter the Hawaiian spinner dolphins.

2 Hrs.

DETAILS

Sunset Sail Honolulu

Enjoy a two-hour sunset sail while leaving the hustle of Waikiki behind!  As the sun dips below the horizon it will color the sky with shades of orange and pink.

2 Hrs.

DETAILS

Title: Kauai SUP Stand up and Paddle
Content:
Kauai’s SUP is the Garden Isle’s only full service of Stand Up Paddle Board and Surfboard Rental and sales Shop.  Serving locals and visitors alike, if you want to SUP or surf, you have come to the right place.  Although you can take the boards to many spots on Kauai and for multiple days, our shop is conveniently located only one traffic light away from the Wailua river. Enjoy the beautiful adventure to Secret Falls or Fern Grotto on your own time, any day of the week! No previous experience required! 

At Kauai SUP your appropriate rental SUP board will be hand selected by our professional staff based on your size, ability and destination.  On top of the best board you will also be using a light weight carbon fiber paddle and waterproof dry bags. 

Getting the customer on the right board makes the difference, whether it’s the extra stability for the novice paddler or the perfect Hawaii wave surfing board. 

Check out our website or give us a call to see how we can help get you and your party on the water!

Title: Polynesian Adventure Tours - Big Island
Content:
Each tour is professionally operated by Polynesian Adventure Tours, on of Hawaii's largest and most successful tour and transportation companies, with 43 years of experience delighting visitors to the Big Island.

Selecting one of our tours means you'll enjoy a safe, enjoyable experience as you learn about the island's history, Hawaiian culture and current island lifestyle. Most of all, you'll view the island's incredible beauty as your delightful driver guide shares its most remarkable sights. We are also locally owned and operated business, booking a tour with us supports local businesses across all the Hawaiian Islands.

Tours are operated aboard late model, deluxe tour vehicles. Many tours are best suited for comfortable deluxe minibuses or Sprinters which offer convenient amenities and oversized windows. On tours where the use of larger vehicles is optimal, we operate full-size luxury motor coaches with plenty of personal space and loads of comfort.

Book A Polynesian Adventure Tour Today!

Volcano Adventure Tour (H2)

Discover the source of Hawaii Island’s creation at Hawaii Volcanoes National Park! Explore cascading waterfalls, craters, and the tsunami-stricken city of Hilo on this comprehensive volcano adventure tour. 

10.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Title: Polynesian Adventure Tours - Oahu
Content:
Each tour is professionally operated by Polynesian Adventure Tours, on of Hawaii’s largest and most successful tour and transportation companies, with 43 years of experience delighting visitors to the Island of Oahu.

Selecting one of our tours means you’ll enjoy a safe, enjoyable experience as you learn about the island’s history, Hawaiian culture and current island lifestyle. Most of all, you’ll view the island’s incredible beauty as your delightful driver guide shares its most remarkable sights. We are also locally owned and operated business, booking a tour with us supports local businesses across all the Hawaiian Islands.

Tours are operated aboard late model, deluxe tour vehicles. Many tours are best suited for comfortable deluxe minibuses or Sprinters which offer convenient amenities and oversized windows. On tours where the use of larger vehicles is optimal, we operate full-size luxury motor coaches with plenty of personal space and loads of comfort.

Book A Polynesian Adventure Tour Today!

Arizona Memorial, Punchbowl & Honolulu City Highlights Tour (2B)

This is by far our single most popular Pearl Harbor tour. Visit the famed USS Arizona Memorial to pay respects to those lost during the air attack of 1941.

6 Hrs.

DETAILS

Oahu Grand Circle Island Tour w/Lunch - Halona Blowhole, Waimea Valley & Dole Plantation (7B)

Our acclaimed Grand Circle Island Tour of Oahu is the most enjoyable way to see the entire island in a single day.

9.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

North Shore Horseback Riding / Legacy Forest (OA2)

Our new and exciting small group adventure takes you out of Waikiki to the beautiful North Shore of Oahu.

10.25 Hrs.

DETAILS

Oahu to Hilo: Helicopter & Volcano Adventure Tour (H2 HELI-1D)

Fly from Oahu to Hilo for a volcano adventure where you’ll view dormant and active volcanoes, craters, steam vents and miles of lava beds!

15.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Oahu to Hilo: Volcano Adventure Tour (H2-1D)

A volcano adventure where you’ll view dormant and active volcanoes, craters, steam vents and miles of lava beds!

15.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Premium USS Missouri, Arizona Memorial & Punchbowl Luxury Tour (63P)

Join like-minded guests preferring a deluxe small vehicle experience for their exclusive tour of Pearl Harbor’s two most iconic sites.

8.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

USS Missouri, Arizona & Punchbowl with Lunch (63)

You’ll experience the USS Missouri and USS Arizona on this tour and learn firsthand of their history and thrill at the accounts of the brave crews who manned them.

8 Hrs.

DETAILS

USS Missouri Tour, Arizona Memorial & Punchbowl National Cemetery (63)

Pearl Harbor with a comfortable narrated drive through Honolulu’s most iconic sites including the Punchbowl National Cemetery.

8 Hrs.

DETAILS

World War II Heroes Deluxe Pearl Harbor w/Lunch (39)

Experience all of Pearl Harbor on this comprehensive WWII Heroes Adventure Tour.

9.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

World War 2 Heroes Deluxe Pearl Harbor Tour (39)

Experience all of Pearl Harbor on this comprehensive WWII Heroes Adventure Tour.

9.5 Hrs.

Title: Polynesian Adventure Tours - Maui
Content:
Each tour is professionally operated by Polynesian Adventure Tours, on of Hawaii’s largest and most successful tour and transportation companies, with 43 years of experience delighting visitors to the Island of Maui.

Selecting one of our tours means you’ll enjoy a safe, enjoyable experience as you learn about the island’s history, Hawaiian culture and current island lifestyle. Most of all, you’ll view the island’s incredible beauty as your delightful driver guide shares its most remarkable sights. We are also locally owned and operated business, booking a tour with us supports local businesses across all the Hawaiian Islands.

Tours are operated aboard late model, deluxe tour vehicles. Many tours are best suited for comfortable deluxe minibuses or Sprinters which offer convenient amenities and oversized windows. On tours where the use of larger vehicles is optimal, we operate full-size luxury motor coaches with plenty of personal space and loads of comfort.

Book A Polynesian Adventure Tour Today!

Best of Maui, Haleakala & Iao Valley (M1)

Experience essential Maui on this laid-back journey showcasing nature’s finery, historic landmarks, and charming country towns.

9.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Haleakala Sunset Tour w/Dinner (M5G)

Experience essential Maui on For those guests who prefer to sleep in, the Haleakala Sunset Tour offers an equally dazzling show of light and color as the Haleakala Sunrise Tour but at twilight.

8.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Haleakala Sunset Tour wo/Dinner (M5G)

A sensational solar experience and incredible panoramic view from Haleakala at 9,740 feet. Marvel at the show of dazzling light and breathtaking colors.

7 Hrs.

DETAILS

Kahului-Maui to Oahu: Pearl Harbor, Arizona Memorial, USS Missouri Tour (A2 OGG-1D)

Experience essential Maui on Join us for a day trip from Maui to Pearl Harbor tour, visit Pearl Harbor, Arizona Memorial, and the Battleship Missouri.

14.25 Hrs.

DETAILS

Road to Hana Adventure w/Lunch (M2)

If you visit Maui, you absolutely “must” travel the picturesque Road to Hana, and you should enjoy it in the comfort of a deluxe, air-conditioned, smooth riding minibus with a professional driver.

12.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Spectacular Haleakala Sunrise Tour w/Breakfast (M3)

Viewing the Maui sunrise atop the summit area of Haleakala is among the most sought-after experiences in the islands.

9.5 Hrs.

DETAILS

Title: Duke's Kayak Adventures
Content:
Aloha and welcome to the most professionally-run and fun kayaking adventure on Kauai. Take an unforgettable journey with us paddling along the majestic Wailua river valley.

We offer a guided kayaking and hiking tour of the Wailua river and Uluwehi falls a.k.a. Secret Falls. Our professional tour guides will take you paddling through some of Kauai’s most sacred waterways, hiking through some of the most beautiful luscious tropical forest Kauai has to offer while sharing myths, legends and some Hawaiian history all the way to Secret Falls.

If you love waterfalls, beautiful scenery, hiking and kayaking, then this is the tour for you.
This is an unforgettable experience that the entire family can enjoy.

Our goal is to operate a quality tour and give our customers memories that will last a lifetime. We use top quality kayaks and paddles for your convenience. 

No previous experience required!

Title: Princeville Makai Golf Club
Content: Golfers of all skill levels need to experience why National Geographic Traveler named Princeville Makai Golf Club as one of the top five most scenic golf courses in the world. Enjoy immaculate conditions with stunning mountain and ocean views where luxurious golfing meets incredible scenery, great food and atmosphere. Their Sunset Golf Cart Tour takes you through six signature stops. Each has something to offer whether it be a story of Queen’s Bath or views of the north shore peaks, Hihimanu, Namolokama and Mamalahoa. Sharpen your skills at one of their golf clinics or private lessons. Other options include yoga and disc golf on the Mauka course. Book your tee time and prepare for an incredible experience. Satisfy your hunger and grab a delicious bite at The Makai Grill before or after your adventure!

Content: Come in and enjoy FREE SAMPLES of our exotic tropical flavored nuts! Sweet kettle roasted Local Macadamias plus pecans, almonds, savory nut mixes and sweet nut butters! Tropical drink infusions, local honey, local bbq and hot sauces, we are your one-stop gift shop!

Title: Koke'e Museum
Content:
To learn about some of the island’s native plants and animals, stop by Kōkeʻe Natural History Museum. The museum has been serving visitors since 1953. Refreshed in 2020, the museum features exhibits about the endemic and native flora and fauna of Kōke‘e as well as some of its interesting history. For the convenience of park visitors, a large trail map with detailed descriptions is outside on the front porch. Please note that many online maps can’t be accessed throughout most of Kōke‘e and some online maps are very inaccurate. Pick up exclusive souvenirs of your visit to Kōke‘e and Waimea Canyon State Parks, browse through their Hawaiian book selection, or find unique gifts in the museum shop. The nonprofit museum is open daily with free admission with a suggested donation of $3.

A 975-foot Nature Trail loop behind the museum takes you on a self-guided tour through the native forest. Ask the staff about seasonal activities, and what hike is best for your group. If you want to be sure about their hours before heading out, call 808-335-9975 or visit Kōkeʻe.org for more information and a link to weather in the area.

Title: Koke'e Lodge
Content: Situated in the heart of Kōkeʻe State park, Kōkeʻe Lodge is a popular island destination for locals and tourists alike. Sit in front of their fireplace and enjoy a lunch special and/or cocktail while listening to live local music. With a focus on “farm to table,” you can find everything from Classic Chili and Cornbread to Chef Samson’s specialty dishes that utilize items from some of Kauai’s finest ranchers, farmers and fishermen. From their cafe, you can find specialty coffees, smoothies and lemonades made with seasonal fruits from Hale Puna Farms. Don’t forget to stop in at their gift shop for a memento. Choose from their logo wear to an array of made-in- Hawaii products.

Title: Grand Hyatt Kauai Luau
Content: The most significant style of celebration in ancient Hawaii was the luau, held to honor kings, gods and guests. Luau are now a distinct element of island culture synonymous with celebrations. The Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort & Spa Luau welcomes you to join them for this time-honored event. They offer this luau to give visitors to the island a glimpse of Hawaiian history, culture, and tradition. You will find the feast unparalleled, with traditional Hawaiian dishes, as well as delicious cuisine from all of Hawaii’s modern-day cultures. The extraordinary entertainment features musicians and dancers performing chants, songs and dances from all of the Polynesian islands. The art of hula arrived in Hawaii with the Polynesian voyagers that inhabited the Hawaiian Islands about 2,500 years ago. Recognized for its graceful movements, hula is an expressive, interpretive dance form telling a story with each motion.

Title: Script A Project
Content:
A transcription service is a business service that converts speech into a written or electronic text document. Transcription services are often provided for business, legal, or medical purposes.

Businesses & Clients Needing Professional Certified Transcription Services


The list of businesses requiring certified audio transcription services is increasing with every passing day. Initially, certified transcription services were majorly related to the legal and law industry alone but with time people and businesses have started realizing that these services are important for a broad range of niches.

Out of the thousands of online certified transcription services, a business needs to find the one that is completely suitable as per their requirements. Different industries have varying requirements and only an authorized brand can be your perfect certified transcription partner.

Certified transcription is a process where the transcribed file is delivered back to the client along with a certificate which states that the transcription is complete and accurate. The legally certified transcription services are in demand for a long time now but the other domains have recently started finding them useful.

Title: Honolulu Burger Company - Kaimuki Location
Content:
Honolulu Burger Company has opened its first sit down, full-service restaurant in Kaimuki. The new location is at 3583 Waialae Avenue, the main restaurant complex between 11th and 12th Avenue.

The new Kaimuki location offers the same Free-Range, Grass-Fed Big Island beef burgers the restaurant is known for, and they have added new items that are not found at their other locations. These items include Loaded Tater Tots, Deep Fried Brussels Sprouts, Caprese Salad and Wing Dings. More items will be added to the Kaimuki menu in the future. This new location also offers Dave’s Ice Cream and Milkshakes.  

Honolulu Burger Company is proud to serve the freshest island products that are grown, bred and fed local. Whether it’s the butter lettuce from Mari’s Gardens, the tomatoes from Sugarland Farms in Ewa, or their Free-Range, Grass Fed Big Island Beef, you know you are tasting the best of the Islands. Choose from their selection of handcrafted burgers like the house favorites, the Mushroom Mushroom Burger and the Blue Hawaii Burger, or feel free to design your own.

Honolulu Burger Company Kaimuki - Grand Opening Weekend | 3583 Waialae Avenue | (808) 762-0552

Title: Volcano Pizza Kauai
Content:
We believe pizza brings people and families together

Pizzaiolo (Chef) Tom Iannucci has a passion for pizza, for life and the many different people that visit, or call Kauai their home. This can be clearly seen in his NY & Neapolitan Pizza creations and his constant milling about the restaurant talking with his customers.

Title: Mama Nita's
Content:
North Shore Food Truck
One of the must-try food trucks in Hale'iwa is Mama Nita's. Owner, Rick Santos, is serving up his take on local comfort food. Their menu showcases a melting pot of cravings that range from burritos to bentos to grilled sandwiches enjoyed by adults and children alike. Mama Nita's checks off all the boxes when it comes to incorporating local classics. Highly recommended items include the Bacon & Mac Grilled Cheese and Nita's Loco Moco. For the latest updates, hours of operation, and daily specials, be sure to check out their Instagram @mamanitashi
