Title: Sun & Salt Adventures
Content:
Our mission is to create opportunities for people to experience the unique natural environment of Kailua, Hawaii in a responsible, sustainable and community focused manner. Our guided kayak tours of Hawaii will show you the natural beauty of the ocean and the many creatures within. Whether you are looking for Kailua Beach kayak rentals or a Kailua Beach adventure kayak tour, you are in the right place!

Book A Sun & Salt Adventure

Shore Break Adventure

Our shore break adventure is the easy way to get out of Waikiki and go body boarding and snorkeling in an area where sea life flourish.

5.5 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="twogoodkayaks" items="19" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Kayak Rentals

We offer many different types of rentals for you to enjoy a beautiful day in Kailua. You may enjoy your rentals on any part of the island. Book your rental today!

Half or Full-Day

[lightframe shortname="twogoodkayaks" items="60" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Popola Guided Tour

This paddling tour takes place on calm, reef-protected waters on Kailua Bay, Oahu. One of our trained guides will lead you along this beautiful coastal area to Popoi’a Island.

2.5 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="twogoodkayaks" items="331" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Na Mokulua Guided Adventure

This paddling tour takes place on calm, reef-protected waters on Kailua Bay, Oahu. One of our trained guides will lead you along this beautiful coastal area to Moku Nui Island.

5.5 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="twogoodkayaks" items="330" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Ocean Adventure

Take a drive through the windward side. The windward coast of Oahu has over 12 varieties of seabirds inhabiting this flourishing coastline. Perfect for the courageous and curious thrill-seekers.

5.5 Hrs

[lightframe shortname="twogoodkayaks" items="332" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Private Lessons

Not sure how to kayak, sufski, SUP, surf, snorkel or boogieboard? Let us show you all the tricks. Book a one-hour private lesson.

1 Hr.

[lightframe shortname="twogoodkayaks" items="447" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Week Rentals

Rent a kayak for a full week, or for how ever long you need it.

Weekly Rentals

Beach Equipment Rentals

Need some beach equipment to enjoy your time on Oahu? Check out all our equipment rentals.

-

Private Tours

Choose the area of your tour from several possibilities that offer the creme de la creme of kayaking on Oahu.

6 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="twogoodkayaks" items="335241" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] LEARN MORE [/lightframe]

Family Picnic Pack

Leave all stress behind and treat yourself to a beach day! The warm Hawaiian sun and calming ocean waves will help you appreciate what it means to live on island time. We’ll prepare all your necessities, just grab, go and enjoy! 

Minimum 2 People

Title: Na Pali Odyssey Boat Tours
Content: Exciting ride up Nā Pali coast! Board our 6 passenger "RIB" RIgid Inflatable Boat (Navy Seals use for special ops known to be unsinkable. Explore sea caves, see marine life in it's most natural form. Boat Tours and Charters. Snorkeling is offered when you book a private charter. See website for booking details.

Title: Captain Max Boat Tours
Content:
Captain Max Boat Tours offers an unforgettable experience in Hawaii. With a captain and crew with years of experience, they will take you on a journey to explore the hidden coves, majestic cliffs, and beautiful landscape of Oahu’s east coast. They offer private tours for groups of up to 6 people that can be tailored to your specific interests. Whether it’s whale watching (December - May is Whale Watching season), snorkeling, sunset cruises or a private island party, Captain Max Boat Tours has something for everyone. They only use the best equipment and are fully insured. So come join them on an adventure to explore Hawaii from the sea! You won't be disappointed.

Book A Captain Max Boat Tour Today!

Turtle Canyon Snorkel

The Captain and Professional Snorkel guide will take you to Turtle Canyon which is one of the best Snorkel spots on island to swim with sea turtles.

1.5 Hrs.

Ages 5+

[lightframe shortname="captainmaxboattours" items="313227" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] LEARN MORE [/lightframe]

Whale Watching Waikiki

Join us for a Whale Watching tour in Waikiki! We will take you for a fun, adventurous coastal cruise and keep our eyes out for the majestic Humpback whales that migrate to Hawai’i every winter.

1.5 Hrs.

Ages 5+

[lightframe shortname="captainmaxboattours" items="331559" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] LEARN MORE [/lightframe]

Title: Prince Kuhio Tours
Content:
Prince Kuhio Tours specializes in sightseeing tours of Honolulu, Hawaii and its surrounding areas. With over 25 years of experience, they are well-versed in the history and culture of the Hawaiian Islands. Their friendly tour guides will provide interesting facts while also making sure you feel comfortable during your journey. They offer a variety of options, including private tours with customized itineraries, group tours with preplanned activities, and full-day excursions that take you to some of the most popular attractions in the region such as Diamond Head State Monument or Pearl Harbor. Whichever option you choose, Prince Kuhio Tours guarantees an unforgettable experience so you can get the most out of your vacation! Their commitment to providing excellent service is apparent from their experienced guides, comfortable vehicles, and flexible scheduling options. Prince Kuhio Tours also offers special packages for corporate events, anniversaries, birthdays, and other celebrations. So book your tour with Prince Kuhio Tours today and enjoy an unforgettable experience in the beautiful Hawaiian Islands!

Book A Prince Kuhio Tour Today!

Sunrise Breakfast Cruise

Sail away from the bustling city of Honolulu as the morning sun rises over the mountains of Oahu! All while enjoying a cup of our 100% Kona coffee and our chef inspired specialty breakfast!

1.5 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="hawaiioceanadventures" items="262989" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Whale Watching & Breakfast Tour

Watch the blue waters come alive as you savor the morning sun on the open decks, searching for migrating whales, dolphins, Hawaiian sea turtles and more! All while enjoying a unique, chef inspired breakfast.

2 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="hawaiioceanadventures" items="265170" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Whale Watching Tour

Watch whales swim, play, feed and breach, in their natural environment. This excursion is truly a life altering experience. This Prince Kuhio Cruise is truly awe-inspiring.

2 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="hawaiioceanadventures" items="265184" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Sunset Dinner Cruise

There are few things more impressive than an ocean view sunset in Hawaii. Our Sunset Dinner Cruise takes you along the Waikiki shore all the way to Diamond Head, known to Hawaiians as Lēʻahi, and provides breathtaking scenery all around.

2 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="hawaiioceanadventures" items="265186" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Fireworks & Waikiki Lights Cruise

The Fireworks & Waikiki Lights Cruise meanders along the shoreline from Ala Moana Park to an optimal viewing position for the Waikiki Hilton's fireworks show.

1.5 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="hawaiioceanadventures" items="265484" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Late Breakfast Cruise

For those of you who appreciate a more leisurely start to your day! Watch the blue waters come alive as you savor the morning sun on the open decks, searching for dolphins, Hawaiian sea turtles and more!

1.5 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="hawaiioceanadventures" items="281128" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Moonlight Dinner Cruise

The lights of Waikiki beneath a starry Hawaiian sky is a magical experience. Our Moonlight Dinner Cruise takes you along the Waikiki shore all the way to Diamond Head, known to Hawaiians as Lēʻahi.

2 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="hawaiioceanadventures" items="308887" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Scenic BBQ Lunch Cruise

Our fantastic Chef Cater wants to offer his special BBQ recipes, so what better venue to do that than with a lunch cruise along the scenic Waikiki shoreline!

1.5 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="hawaiioceanadventures" items="367767" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Sunset & Fireworks Dinner Cruise

There are few things more impressive than an ocean view sunset in Hawaii. Our Sunset & Fireworks Dinner Cruise takes you along the Waikiki shore all the way to Diamond Head, known to Hawaiians as Lēʻahi.

2 Hrs.

Title: Honolulu Sailing Company
Content:
Honolulu Sailing Company is an exciting sailing adventure experience based in Honolulu, Hawaii. The company specializes in providing the best sailing trips for friends, couples and families alike. From romantic sunset cruises to full day adventures on the Pacific Ocean, Honolulu Sailing Company has something for everyone!

Their experienced and knowledgeable crew will guide you through your sailing experience, ensuring a safe and fun time. Honolulu Sailing Company also prides itself in offering excellent customer service. They have a commitment to safety, quality, professionalism and customer satisfaction that makes Honolulu Sailing Company the perfect choice for those looking for an unforgettable sailing excursion! Whether you’re a beginner or experienced sailor, Honolulu Sailing Company can help you explore Honolulu and the surrounding islands in the most memorable way. Come join Honolulu Sailing Company for your next sailing adventure!

Book a Honolulu Sailing Company Adventure Today!

Sail & Sea Turtle Cruise

Features a three hour private cruise aboard a luxury yacht. Don mask and snorkel and swim with the Sea Turtles in the cryslal clear Hawaiian waters.

3 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="honsail" items="4278" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Diamond Head Sunset Cruise

Features a two-hour cruise aboard a private luxury yacht. Enjoy the beauty of a Hawaiian Sunset from your private yacht in comfort and style. Hawaii's Best Sunset Cruise

2 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="honsail" items="5544" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Waikiki Sail & Snorkel Adventure

Features a three-hour cruise aboard a private luxury yacht. Enjoy a leisurely sail off the idyllic coast of Oahu's famous Waikiki Beach with stunning views and a chance to see dolphins, sea turtles and whales in season.

3 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="honsail" items="292927" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Private Whale Watching Cruise

Enjoy a leisurely sail against the majestic backdrop of Diamond Head as you scan the water for majestic whales. Dolphins, sea turtles, and manta rays are often seen while relaxing aboard with your family and friends.

3 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="honsail" items="326188" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Offshore Fishing

Sport fishing from a sailboat is a true adventure! We head offshore where the big fish are and sail fast to catch real gamefish like mahimahi, ono, and tuna.

3 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="honsail" items="326199" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Title: Hawaii Ocean Rafting
Content: At Hawaii Ocean Rafting, we specialize in Maui snorkeling tours. Whether you are interested in dolphin watching and snorkeling tours in Lanai or whale watching tours in Maui, we have got you covered. Additionally, we offer private boat charters so that you can take your ohana (family) to enjoy the full Hawaiian experience. Hawaii Ocean Rafting is owned and operated by a native Hawaiian and Lahaina local. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that we provide opportunities for you to experience authentic Hawaiian culture.
Tags: dolphin watching and snorkeling tours in Lanai|Maui snorkeling tours|private boat charters|whale watching tours in Maui

Title: Moana Sailing Company
Content:
Moana Sailing Company is a premier sailing tour business based in Honolulu, Hawaii. Whether you're looking for a relaxing day on the water or an adventure of a lifetime, Moana Sailing can provide it. With experienced staff and modern vessels, Moana Sailing offers top-notch sailing charters and tours around Oahu and beyond. Moana's signature tour is their Prince Kuhiu Tour, which takes visitors to historical sites throughout the island such as Pearl Harbor, Diamond Head, and more. On this journey, Moana guides will take you back in time to learn about Hawaiian culture and history with fascinating stories about ancient Hawaiian gods and goddesses. Moana also provides private charters for deep sea fishing, sunset sails, and whale watching. Moana Sailing provides a unique and enjoyable experience for all ages. Come sail with Moana and make your next vacation an adventure.

Book A Tour With Moana Sailing Company

Snorkel Adventure

The best way to start your day! Come snorkel with us at Turtle Canyon, a green sea turtle cleaning station. Our crew will show you not only turtles but also hidden creatures such as He’e (octopus) and Ka Hoku Kai Starfish).

2 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="moanawaikiki" items="249215" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Sunset Sail

We have the most beautiful sunsets in the world and you'll have a clear view from the water on the Manakai. Our sunset sail is by far a must for anyone visiting Hawaii.

2 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="moanawaikiki" items="249218" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Friday Fireworks Cruise

The spectacular night view of Honolulu city with the surrounding Ko'olau mountain range is breath taking. To top off your evening you'll partake in an incredible firework display.

1.5 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="moanawaikiki" items="249219" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Sunrise Sail

Whether completing your night or starting off your day, come experience the tranquility and beauty of Mamala Bay and the Waikiki Coast as a new day dawns.

1.5 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="moanawaikiki" items="249220" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Starlit Boat Party on Moana

Bring good vibes, and enjoy a night filled with fun and premium drinks from our On-Board Bar while cruising with us aboard the luxurious Moana Catamaran!

2 Hrs.

Title: Ko Olina Ocean Adventures
Content:
Ko Olina Ocean Adventures in Honolulu, Hawaii offers a host of water-based activities for visitors. From swimming and snorkeling to kayaking and paddleboarding, Ko Olina has it all. The Ko Olina Marine Preserve is home to an abundance of marine life, including turtles, dolphins, manta rays, and tropical fish. Visitors can explore the crystal clear waters and observe these amazing creatures up close. Ko Olina also offers guided tours of the ocean floor as well as unique opportunities to swim with dolphins or even sea lions! Ko Olina Ocean Adventures provides the perfect opportunity for families or groups of friends to have a memorable time out on the water in beautiful Honolulu. With so much to do, Ko Olina makes a great destination for a fun-filled day of adventure!

Book A Ko Olina Ocean Adventure Today!

Sunset Sail

Join us for appetizers, three complimentary drinks and a beautiful Hawaiian sunset sail.

2 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="koolinaoceanadventures" items="58193" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Catamaran Snorkel Sail - Sunrise

Your captain will choose from three fabulous west Oahu snorkel reefs, each teeming with tropical reef fish, exotic ocean wildlife and frequent visits from a variety of rays.

3 Hrs.

[lightframe shortname="koolinaoceanadventures" items="323959" asn="fhdn" asn-ref="thisweekhawaii" full-item="yes" flow="no" branding="yes" bookable-only="yes"] BOOK NOW [/lightframe]

Catamaran Snorkel Sail - Midday

During your shoreline sail, your friendly and knowledgeable captain and crew will be on the lookout for a viewing encounter with the playful and entertaining Hawaiian spinner dolphins.

3 Hrs.

Title: Hawaii Bucket List Tours
Content:
Hawaii Bucket List Tours offers exciting experiences for Hawaii visitors looking to make the most of their stay. From surf lessons and snorkeling tours, to helicopter rides and sunset cruises, Hawaii Bucket List Tours has something for everyone. Visitors can choose from a variety of tour packages tailored to different activities and interests, such as swimming with dolphins, kayaking in Hawaii's crystal clear waters, or discovering hidden waterfalls on a jungle hike. Each tour is led by experienced local guides who will provide unique insight into Hawaii’s culture and history while sharing their passion for the islands' natural beauty. With Hawaii Bucket List Tours, visitors are sure to have an unforgettable experience filled with adventure and discovery!

No matter your age or skill level, Hawaii Bucket List Tours offers something for everyone. From snorkeling beginners to experienced adventurers, Hawaii Bucket List Tours has packages and activities to meet your needs. Whether you are looking to explore Hawaii’s unique wildlife or find the perfect surf spot, Hawaii Bucket List Tours can make it happen. Moreover, Hawaii Bucket List Tours is committed to giving back to the local community and preserving Hawaii's natural beauty by engaging in sustainable tourism practices. So what are you waiting for? Pack your bags and let Hawaii Bucket List Tours show you the islands' beautiful and diverse culture!

Book a Hawaii Bucket List Tour Today!

Oahu Circle Island Tour From Waikiki

Let's us pick you up from your hotel in my 14 passengers lifted van and take you on a ride you will never forget! We’ll do a circle around the island, and hit every spot on the way that just can’t be missed.

Up To 14 People

Whether you already know what you want to do, have no idea, or somewhere in-between, we'll work with you to personalize your day, so that you spend the maximum time doing what you want, and avoid all the stuff you don't want.

Title: Waikiki Starlight Hawaiian Luau
Content:
Hilton Hawaiian Village celebrates the colorful heritage of the Pacific Island at Waikiki's premier outdoor luau!

Waikiki Starlight Hawaiian Luau is one of the most popular and renowned luau experiences in Honolulu, Hawaii. Guests are invited to an evening full of entertainment, including traditional Hawaiian cuisine and music. Enjoy a delicious buffet featuring local dishes like poi, lomi salmon and kalua pig, all served under the stars around an open fire pit. Experience mesmerizing performances with hula dancing and breathtaking fire knife shows. Waikiki Starlight takes pride in providing guests with an authentic cultural experience that will leave lasting memories for years to come. Perfect for couples or families looking for a unique night out, Waikiki Starlight is sure to be an unforgettable adventure! Come join us at Waikiki Starlight Hawaiian Luau to experience the beauty and culture of Honolulu, Hawaii!

Book a Waikiki Starlight Hawaiian Luau Today!

Diamond Premier Seating

Your Luau! Do As Much Or As Little As You Want. Join the Group Hula Lesson. Or simply unwind with authentic Hawaiian cuisine and a refreshing cocktail with a backdrop of lilting island music and dance.

4 Hrs.

Title: Hawaii Nautical
Content: We have Hawaii's largest ocean-activity fleet of vessels from Oahu to the Big Island! We practice the highest level of safety in all we do. We respect the ocean and the ecosystem and help to protect all marine mammals and wildlife. A portion of our proceeds go to helping NOAA with dolphin conservation and follow the guidelines to protect coral reefs around the world to preserve valuable ecosystems.

Title: Kamoauli
Content:
Come experience Kamoauli, a traditional Polynesian wa'a kaulua - an all-wood, double-hulled sailing canoe! We are dedicated to preserving and perpetuating Hawaiian culture through our storytelling of our native history, myths and legends of ancient Hawaii.

Kamoauli offers visitors an unforgettable experience on the beautiful waters surrounding Oahu. Kamoauli has a variety of different charter options to choose from, such as private charters for family outings and corporate events. Kamoauli's experienced staff will help plan your perfect charter so you can relax and enjoy the views of the incredible Hawaiian coastline. Kamoauli also provides all necessary safety equipment and supplies to ensure your safety during your time out at sea. From snorkeling trips to whale-watching tours, Kamoauli ensures each passenger a unique and enjoyable experience. With Kamoauli, explore the wonders of Oahu's beautiful waters in a fun and comfortable way. Kamoauli Boat Charters is the perfect choice for those seeking an unforgettable adventure!

Book a Kamoauli Tour Today!

Morning Sail

Come aboard and experience this unique, place-based educational platform for a weekday morning sail filled with activities, refreshments, and relaxation.

2 Hrs.

Title: Queens Waikiki Luau
Content:
Queens Waikiki Luau is an iconic luau experience in Honolulu, Hawaii. At Queens Waikiki Luau guests are welcomed to a traditional Hawaiian evening that includes three (3) complimentary Mai Tai or soft drinks, kalua pig, live music and entertainment. Enjoy a variety of delicious Hawaiian food, including poi, lomi salmon and kalua pig. Queens Waikiki Luau also features hula performances with the beautiful grass skirts swaying in the breeze. The show takes you back to Hawaii's ancient past as you witness the graceful dance moves of the performers. Watch skilled musicians create enchanting rhythms on traditional drums and observe a fire knife dance. Queens Waikiki Luau is an amazing evening that offers guests a taste of the Hawaiian culture. Queens Waikiki Luau is sure to be an experience you won't soon forget.

Enjoy this unique luau today - book your tickets for Queens Waikiki Luau and get ready for a wonderful night of Hawaiian culture, music, food and entertainment. Aloha!

Make Your Queens Waikiki Luau Reservations Today!

Middle Row Seating

Conveniently located in the heart of Waikiki at the International Market Place! Learn the Hula, Eat Delicious Hawaiian Food, and enjoy an authentic Polynesian Show which includes the traditional dances from across the Pacific as well as the famed Fireknife Dance!

2.5 Hrs.

Title: HI Honey Farm
Content:
Come visit Hawaii Honey Farm. Whether you're looking for an educational experience on bees and the honey-making process, or simply want to try out beekeeping for a day, Hawaii Honey Farm is an experience that you will never forget along the North Shore of Oahu. We also have a honey tasting for a sweet treat harvested right here on site.

Book A Tour of HI Honey Farm Today!

North Shore Apiary Tour & Honey Tasting

Come and enjoy a unique apiary and honey tasting experience with Hi Honey Farm on the North Shore of Oahu.

1.5 Hrs.

Title: Déménagement Bruxelles
Content:
Déménageur à Bruxelles fondée il y a 15 ans, Eurodemenagement a toujours eu pour objet de répondre aux besoins de sa clientèle en proposant la location de lift à Bruxelles conformé au normes de sécurité, des camions, camionettes recente pour réaliser votre déménagement bruxelles.
Ainsi, Euro Déménagement se porte garant d’une qualité de services exemplaire, mais aussi d’une parfaite maitrise des réglementations et d’une relation-client efficace pour l’ensemble de ses interventions.
Fort de son expérience, Euro Déménagement répond à vos besoins en apportant à chaque déménagement un ensemble de services complémentaires personnalisés.

Title: Clear Clean Window Cleaners Bristol
Content:
Clear and Clean Window Cleaners Bristol was founded and is owned by Keith Wilks also known as Keith the window cleaner. Keith launched his Bristol company back in July 2000. Prior to this he was an Engineer for 27 years and believes the disciplines he gained then for getting the job done right along with his sunny disposition, hard work and professional service has earned him his loyal customer base. Therefore, He has one mission and that is to offer you the best possible cleaning service in Bristol. His motto is “There is only one thing worse than a dirty window and that is a poorly cleaned one!bristol window cleaners

Title: The Pineapple Express
Content:
Why not have a tour company that specializes in small groups? A tour wherein you are bound to make friends with people from all over the world? A tour company that has a lower-than-average cost and, at the same time, brings high excitement, smiles, and unforgettable memories that will last a lifetime? Well, here we are. 

We strive to go above and beyond for our clients no matter the challenge. We aim to deliver our very best tour every single day. Our Circle Island Tour takes up to 13 passengers around the island to experience the best that Oahu has to offer. Starting and ending in Waikiki, our guides will ensure a great time for all ages as they take you through 10+ spots well-appreciated on island! At the end of your tour, each party will receive a FREE locally-grown pineapple as our token of aloha to you. Check out our website or call us to BOOK NOW or LEARN MORE today!

Title: Explore The Captain Kenny Collection
Content:
Kenneth Roland Neizman (1932-2003), aka “CAPTAIN KENNY“, was described as “The Picasso Of The Pacific” by The Maui News in 1977. 

For over two decades from the early ‘70’s throughout the early ‘90’s, Captain Kenny was a fixture on the streets of Lahaina.  Nearly every day he could be found creating his distinctly unique artwork under a palm tree at one of his makeshift studios down at the beach and then he’d wander the streets hawking his wares from his “cart gallery”, a shopping cart chock-full of his latest creations. 

With his unorthodox appearance, hilarious sales routines,  and endearing antics, Captain Kenny was a beloved symbol of Maui’s individualism. He became the island’s unofficial Ambassador Of Aloha.

As he put it, “It all began when the coconut hit me on the head!”. True story.  From that point on, Captain Kenny began to create his artwork which features a large cast of characters comprised of zany/otherworldly/primitive sea creatures all born from his imagination.  Usually rendered in his signature “stained glass” style, his art displays an innocent yet complex creative process known only to him.

“Outsider Art”, a fast growing segment of the Art market today, is described in part as “Art made by self-taught or supposedly naïve artists with typically little or no contact with the conventions of the art worlds.”  Captain Kenny is the consummate “Outsider”.

The many people who were lucky enough to acquire Original Captain Kenny artwork during his lifetime have been substantially rewarded.  The value of his work continues to dramatically appreciate over time.  Examples in good condition are commanding four and five figures when they come to market.  Most are held in private collections now and it’s increasingly rare to see original Captain Kenny artwork for sale.

In homage to his legacy, Captain Kenny’s exclusive dealer, Edward Montgomery Fine Art, has created a collection of clothing, prints, and accessories based on Captain Kenny’s original creations.  As a tribute to the artist and offered in the Aloha spirit in which this art was first created, “The Captain Kenny Collection” is an affordable, fun, and easily accessible way for everyone to experience the joy of owning art by “The Picasso Of The Pacific”, Maui’s own, CAPTAIN KENNY. 

To learn more visit; www.captainkennyshop.com. 

Call Edward Montgomery Fine Art  at (831) 622-9292 for any questions. To view available ORIGINAL CAPTAIN KENNY PAINTINGS & DRAWINGS visit; EdwardMontgomeryFineArt.com

Title: X-TREME Parasail
Content:
Welcome to X-treme Parasail, O’ahu’s largest water sports company! Parasailing in Hawaii has been our passion for over three decades. With our team of experienced captains and crew, your fun on the water is guaranteed! The family at X-treme Parasail is happy that you’ve found us online! We invite you to book your Hawaiian parasail online with us today, and we will see you when you get here! We are conveniently located just five minutes from Waikiki.

From here, you’ll see the best views of the island parasailing in Hawaii. Be one with the clouds and get whisked away like a bird. Our team at X-treme Parasail in Honolulu will make sure everyone in your party is safe and secure before taking flight. We’re passionate about sharing the beauty of the island with you. Experience parasailing in Honolulu, Hawaii today by booking online!

Title: Captain J's Kauai Offshore Adventures
Content: Captain J’s Kauai Offshore Adventures has two 37’ NAIAD super rafts, Kauai Voyager I and Kauai Voyager II,  rigid hull rafts built in 2020 and 2022.  These super rafts offer more space and comfort than any zodiac or other raft on Kaua’i. Their guests enjoy individual seating and comfort comparable to a larger catamaran while also experiencing the maneuverability and speed required to access the Na Pali’s smaller caves and waterfalls. A fully equipped restroom on board also alleviates a common concern with this style of boat, while wrap-around safety rails enhance this versatile craft to make it safer for everyone. A sturdy swim ladder enhances the snorkel experience with safe entry and exit from the water. There truly is no better way for the adventurous soul to see the NaPali Coast or Niihau by boat than from their state-of-the-art luxury rafts.

Title: Luxury Property Care
Content:
At Luxury Property Care, we do more than just manage real estate. Luxury Property Care, is a joint endeavor founded by Sivan Gerges and Liran Koren that brings several different business entities owned by each into the ultimate property management concierge service. We are here to consolidate all the separate property care service that investors need into one all-inclusive package so we can deliver next-level profits and peace of mind to our clients. With all these resources under one roof, we offer unparalleled service at unbeatable prices to satisfy every property owner’s and investor’s wildest dreams.

Our Service:

  • Property Management
  • Commercial Properties
  • Tenant Management
  • Property preservation

  • Regular Property Inspections

Title: Ohana Surf Project
Content:
At Ohana Surf Project, we offer high-quality surf lessons and rentals in Waikiki. We aim to help our clients realize their goals of riding waves and gliding across the water with ease via our Waikiki surf lessons and stand up paddleboarding lessons. Ohana Surf Project offers private and group lessons for teens and adults. Additionally, we also offer packages for families with children under 13 years old. When you take lessons from Ohana Surf Project, enjoy peace of mind knowing that our team members consist of professional coaches and guides who are trained in all aspects of safety, including CPR, lifeguard skills, and first aid skills.

Check out our website for more information on Waikiki surfboard rentals, stand up paddle boards, and bodyboard rentals.

Title: Seven Brothers Burgers
Content:
The story started with a young Samoan surfer, who met a beautiful blond, blue eyed California girl in 1976, fell madly in love, had seven boys and purchased a small restaurant in 2019 on Oahu's North Shore. The Seven brothers of the Hannemann family, made up the staff of the Seven Brothers Burgers has been unqiue handcrafted onion rings, outrageous stacked burgers and striking side dishes to local communities in order to celebrate the beauty and complexity of the Hawaiian culture. Their signature Paniolo Burger is made with two homemade onion rings, patty with grilled pineapple, decadent house made bbq sauce, melted American cheese, bacon, tomato, lettuce, and grilled onions on their perfectly cooked hamburger patty.

Seven Brother's has locations in Kahuku, La'ie, Sharks Cove and now the newest location in Haleiwa at 66-197 Kamehameha Hwy, Haleiwa, HI 96712!

Open 11am - 9pm, Closed on Sundays

Title: Best Digital Marketing Agency
Content:
Varun Digital, a subsidiary of stardigital.io USA, is an established digital marketing firm mastering the art of providing domain centric solutions. Backed up by strong technical support, we are a comprehensive solution for all your digital needs.

Our commitment to delivering a wide range of digital marketing solutions is crafted through analyzing marketing needs, goals, and standards. The services we offer are not limited to regular digital practices but are custom-built by implementing the latest and best industry practices. With a keen focus on designing and developing creative yet data driven strategies, we strive to transform your online presence.
